original: slob dpon gyis ni bzlas pa bya //
analyzed: slob dpon gyis ni bzlas pa bya //
translated: The master should perform the recitation.🔽Om Ah Hum Hum.

original: aom a'a:h'um h'um/ 'di lta bu yi rim pa yis //
analyzed: aom a'a:h'um h'um/ 'di lta bu yi rim pa yis //
translated: By means of such a process,

original: grangs med par ni byas nas su //
analyzed: grangs med par ni byas nas su //
translated: having performed [the recitation] countless times,

original: ji srid skyo bar ma gyur par //🔽gong gi dam tshig 'khor lo ni //
analyzed: ji srid skyo bar ma gyur par // gong gi dam tshig 'khor lo ni //
translated: as long as one does not become weary,🔽one should perform the recitation while equipoised

original: mnyam par bzhag ste bzlas pa bya //
analyzed: mnyam par bzhag ste bzlas pa bya //
translated: on the wheel of the commitments mentioned above.

original: dung chen phreng ba blangs nas ni //
analyzed: dung chen phreng ba blangs nas ni //
translated: Taking up the great conch rosary,

original: sdom pa mchog gi bzlas pa bya //
analyzed: sdom pa mchog gi bzlas pa bya //
translated: one should perform the recitation of the supreme vow.

original: aom a'a:h'um/ aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam hum h'um phat d'a ki n'i dz'a la sam ba ram sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom a'a:h'um/ aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam hum h'um phat d'a ki n'i dz'a la sam ba ram sv'ah'a /
translated: Om Ah Hum. Om Shri Vajra Heruka, He He, Ru Ru, Hum Hum, Phat, Dakini Jala Samavara, Svaha.

original: aom badzra b'a ra hi hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom badzra b'a ra hi hum h'um phat/
translated: Om Vajra Varahi Hum Hum Phat.

original: aom d'a ki n'i ye hum h'um phat/🔽aom l'a me hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom d'a ki n'i ye hum h'um phat/ aom l'a me hum h'um phat/
translated: Om Dakiniye Hum Hum Phat.🔽Om Lame Hum Hum Phat.

original: aom khanda ro he hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom khanda ro he hum h'um phat/
translated: Om Khandarohi Hum Hum Phat.

original: aom r'u pi n'i ye hum h'um phat/🔽aom goo r'i hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom r'u pi n'i ye hum h'um phat/ aom goo r'i hum h'um phat/
translated: Om Rupiniye Hum Hum Phat.🔽Om Gouri Hum Hum Phat.

original: aom tsoo r'i hum h'um phat/🔽aom p'a ma he hum h'um phat/🔽aom pee t'a li hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom tsoo r'i hum h'um phat/ aom p'a ma he hum h'um phat/ aom pee t'a li hum h'um phat/
translated: Om Chouri Hum Hum Phat.🔽Om Bahirame Hum Hum Phat.🔽Om Petail Hum Hum Phat.

original: aom puga  si hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom puga  si hum h'um phat/
translated: Om Pugume Hum Hum Phat.

original: aom tsanda li hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom tsanda li hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ caṇḍālī hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom ghasma ri hum h'um phat /aom he ru ka sanni bha hum h'um phat; aom badzra bi ne hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ghasma ri hum h'um phat /aom he ru ka sanni bha hum h'um phat; aom badzra bi ne hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ ghasmarī hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ. Oṃ heruka sannibha hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ. Oṃ vajravinī hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom badzra bam she hum h'um phat/🔽aom badzra mra  hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom badzra bam she hum h'um phat/ aom badzra mra  hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ vajra vaṃśe hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ vajra mṛdaṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom badzra mum ra dze hum h'um phat/🔽aom badzra h'a sye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom badzra mum ra dze hum h'um phat/ aom badzra h'a sye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ vajra muṃja je hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ vajra hāsye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom badzra l'a sye hum h'um phat/🔽aom badzra g'i te hum @231a *//
analyzed: aom badzra l'a sye hum h'um phat/ aom badzra g'i te hum @231a *//
translated: Oṃ vajra lāsye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ vajra gīte hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: h'um phat/ aom badzra nri tye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: h'um phat/ aom badzra nri tye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ vajra nṛtye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom badzra pushpe hum h'um phat/🔽aom badzra dhu pe hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom badzra pushpe hum h'um phat/ aom badzra dhu pe hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ vajra puṣpe hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ vajra dhūpe hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom badzra d'i pe h'um h'um phat/🔽aom badzra gandhe hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom badzra d'i pe h'um h'um phat/ aom badzra gandhe hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ vajra dīpe hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ vajra gandhe hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom r'u pa badzri hum h'um phat/🔽aom ra sa badzri hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom r'u pa badzri hum h'um phat/ aom ra sa badzri hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ rūpa vajrī hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ rasa vajrī hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom sparsha badzri hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom sparsha badzri hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ sparśa vajrī hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom dharma dha tu badzri hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom dharma dha tu badzri hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ dharma dhātu vajrī hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom badzra aam ku sha dza: hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom badzra aam ku sha dza: hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ vajra aṅkuśa jaḥ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom badzra p'a sha hum h'um phat/🔽aom badzra spho ta bam hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom badzra p'a sha hum h'um phat/ aom badzra spho ta bam hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ vajra-pāśa hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ vajra-sphoṭa vaṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom badzra a'a be sha ho: hum h'um phat/🔽aom ya ma d'a dhi ye hum h'um phat/🔽aom ya ma d'u t'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom badzra a'a be sha ho: hum h'um phat/ aom ya ma d'a dhi ye hum h'um phat/ aom ya ma d'u t'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ vajra-āveśa hoḥ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ yamadhīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ yamadūtīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom ya ma damshti n'am ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ya ma damshti n'am ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ yamadamṣṭrīṇāṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽Oṃ yamamathanīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: aom ya ma ma tha n'i ye hum h'um phat; dam tshig can gyis tshig dag pas //
analyzed: aom ya ma ma tha n'i ye hum h'um phat; dam tshig can gyis tshig dag pas //
translated: The one with samaya, with pure speech,

original: mos pa'i yid kyis rtag tu bzla //
analyzed: mos pa'i yid kyis rtag tu bzla //
translated: Always recites with a devoted mind.

original: nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas //
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas //
translated: Endowed with inner union,

original: shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid can //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid can //
translated: The nature of wisdom and method,

original: rang gi thabs dang rigs pa'i lus //
analyzed: rang gi thabs dang rigs pa'i lus //
translated: One's own method and rational body,

original: gnyis su med par mnyam pa'i bdag /
analyzed: gnyis su med par mnyam pa'i bdag /
translated: The nature of non-dual equality,

original: khro bo sprul pa'i tshogs spros pas //
analyzed: khro bo sprul pa'i tshogs spros pas //
translated: Emanating an assembly of wrathful emanations,

original: 'gro ba gsum po bcas par ni //
analyzed: 'gro ba gsum po bcas par ni //
translated: The three realms are filled.

original: he ru kar ni byas nas kyang //
analyzed: he ru kar ni byas nas kyang //
translated: Having made them all into Heruka,

original: sa rnams gsum po ma lus par //
analyzed: sa rnams gsum po ma lus par //
translated: All three levels without exception,

original: thams cad der ni bsdus nas kyang //
analyzed: thams cad der ni bsdus nas kyang //
translated: Having gathered everything there,

original: sku gsung thugs la rnam par gnas //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs la rnam par gnas //
translated: Resides in body, speech, and mind.

original: 'di ni rnal 'byor cho ga ste //
analyzed: 'di ni rnal 'byor cho ga ste //
translated: This is the yoga rite,

original: 'khor lo sgom pa'i bzlas pa 'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo sgom pa'i bzlas pa 'o //
translated: the repetition of the meditation on the wheel.

original: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the yoga of one's deity,

original: rgyu dang mi rgyu mthong ba na //
analyzed: rgyu dang mi rgyu mthong ba na //
translated: when one sees the animate and inanimate,

original: dam tshig can nyid langs dus su //
analyzed: dam tshig can nyid langs dus su //
translated: the one who is bound by the commitments should rise🔽and make supplications to all the tathagatas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // dpa' @231b bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // dpa' @231b bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma //
translated: heroes, and yoginis,

original: mkha' 'gro dang ni mkha' 'gro ma //🔽kun gyis gsol ba gdab par bya //🔽khro bo bde ba'i dgyes pa yi //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro dang ni mkha' 'gro ma // kun gyis gsol ba gdab par bya // khro bo bde ba'i dgyes pa yi //
translated: dakas, and dakinis.

original: longs spyod las ni byung ba yi //
analyzed: longs spyod las ni byung ba yi //
translated: The one who is born from the enjoyment of the bliss of the wrathful one

original: rab rmongs ma yis bsnyen byas nas //
analyzed: rab rmongs ma yis bsnyen byas nas //
translated: should be served by the one who is not confused about the enjoyment that arises from the karma of the hero.

original: bde ba'i sbyor ba la zhugs te //
analyzed: bde ba'i sbyor ba la zhugs te //
translated: Having entered into the practice of bliss,🔽one should make supplications to the heroes and yoginis.

original: ra ma he nangta na su ra a'a ma h'a su h'u ba ra dzo ai ni ka ma la su hu /
analyzed: ra ma he nangta na su ra a'a ma h'a su h'u ba ra dzo ai ni ka ma la su hu /
translated: ra mahe nanta su ra a ma ha su hu vara jo i ni kamala su hu

original: aa la la la ho //
analyzed: aa la la la ho //
translated: ala la la ho

original: su ra aa autta ma ma h'um/
analyzed: su ra aa autta ma ma h'um/
translated: su ra a uttama ma hum

original: ma h'a sidzdza /
analyzed: ma h'a sidzdza /
translated: ma ha si jja

original: au ma dzo ai ni dza la ma ho //
analyzed: au ma dzo ai ni dza la ma ho //
translated: u ma jo i ni ja la ho

original: aa a'i / a'a aa ra ho //🔽aa ru he byi nu su ba ya n'a he /
analyzed: aa a'i / a'a aa ra ho // aa ru he byi nu su ba ya n'a he /
translated: a i a a ra ho🔽a ru he bi nu su ba ya na a he

original: su ra aa su hu de hi ba ra t'a ai ni /
analyzed: su ra aa su hu de hi ba ra t'a ai ni /
translated: su ra a su hu de hi ba ra ta a i ni

original: dza la su h'u bi sa pha na ta ro na na pa de hi ma h'a su h'u ma dzdza mu h'u mo kshu pa la ga kha au /
analyzed: dza la su h'u bi sa pha na ta ro na na pa de hi ma h'a su h'u ma dzdza mu h'u mo kshu pa la ga kha au /
translated: Jala suhu vi sa phanataro nanapatehi maha suhumo jja muhumokṣupala gha kau.

original: tuttu sa h'u na ai su h'um/
analyzed: tuttu sa h'u na ai su h'um/
translated: Tutu sahu ni suhum.

original: badzdzi au mo khu su h'um/🔽ai na ai du /
analyzed: badzdzi au mo khu su h'um/ ai na ai du /
translated: Vajji umokhu suhum.🔽Ina idhu.

original: kha la tha ai mo khu su hu /
analyzed: kha la tha ai mo khu su hu /
translated: Khata ima mokhu suhum.

original: ba su ai pam ka au madza ta nu na ba r'a /
analyzed: ba su ai pam ka au madza ta nu na ba r'a /
translated: Vasupam kauma dzatanunavara.

original: a'a pa da trim/
analyzed: a'a pa da trim/
translated: Apad trim.

original: bhu dza ta nu munyma h'a su h'u /
analyzed: bhu dza ta nu munyma h'a su h'u /
translated: Bhujata numunhasu hum.

original: ai la darpa ya /
analyzed: ai la darpa ya /
translated: Iladarpayo.

original: au ma h'u /
analyzed: au ma h'u /
translated: Uma hu.

original: aa ra b'i aa gi aa pam au ra su /
analyzed: aa ra b'i aa gi aa pam au ra su /
translated: Arabi agipam uru su.

original: 'di yis mgon po bskul na ni //
analyzed: 'di yis mgon po bskul na ni //
translated: If you invoke the Lord with this,

original: dkyil 'khor dngos grub nges pa ste //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dngos grub nges pa ste //
translated: you will certainly attain the mandala and siddhis.

original: snyan cing 'jam pa'i mgrin pa'i dbyangs //
analyzed: snyan cing 'jam pa'i mgrin pa'i dbyangs //
translated: With a melodious and gentle voice,

original: dpyid kyi rgyal po'i glu blangs pas //
analyzed: dpyid kyi rgyal po'i glu blangs pas //
translated: the king of spring sings this song.

original: mkha' 'gro'i dra ba dri med rnams //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro'i dra ba dri med rnams //
translated: The stainless net of dakinis

original: gzigs shing las kun mdzad pa yin //
analyzed: gzigs shing las kun mdzad pa yin //
translated: sees and performs all activities.

original: rdo rje padma yid 'ong ma //
analyzed: rdo rje padma yid 'ong ma //
translated: The delightful vajra and lotus

original: sbyor pas dngos grub thams cad 'grub //
analyzed: sbyor pas dngos grub thams cad 'grub //
translated: united, all siddhis are accomplished.

original: dgyes pa 'di yis bskul na ni //
analyzed: dgyes pa 'di yis bskul na ni //
translated: If you invoke with this delight,

original: bde ba chen po stsol ba yin //
analyzed: bde ba chen po stsol ba yin //
translated: it bestows great bliss.

original: sbyor ba yi ni dus dag tu //
analyzed: sbyor ba yi ni dus dag tu //
translated: At the time of the performance,

original: rdo rje can gyis rab tu sbyar //
analyzed: rdo rje can gyis rab tu sbyar //
translated: the vajra holder should apply them.

original: thog ma dbus dang mthar thug @232a *//
analyzed: thog ma dbus dang mthar thug @232a *//
translated: At the beginning, middle, and end,

original: par; ;yi ge brgya pa'i gsang sngags bzla //
analyzed: par; ;yi ge brgya pa'i gsang sngags bzla //
translated: recite the mantra of the hundred syllables.

original: 'khor lo dag ni brtan byas te //
analyzed: 'khor lo dag ni brtan byas te //
translated: Having stabilized the wheels,

original: dpa' bo dang ni mkha' 'gro ma //
analyzed: dpa' bo dang ni mkha' 'gro ma //
translated: the heroes and dakinis,🔽this is the mantra of all,

original: 'di ni kun gyi gsang sngags te; ;khro bo sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: 'di ni kun gyi gsang sngags te; ;khro bo sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs //
translated: the wrathful one, the buddha, the tathagata.

original: thams cad snying gar brtan byas te //
analyzed: thams cad snying gar brtan byas te //
translated: Having stabilized everything at the heart,

original: bsgoms pas thams cad brtan par 'gyur //
analyzed: bsgoms pas thams cad brtan par 'gyur //
translated: through meditation, everything will be stabilized.🔽If one desires accomplishment for oneself,

original: gal te bdag nyid dngos grub 'dod; ;dngos grub thams cad gnas pa yin //
analyzed: gal te bdag nyid dngos grub 'dod; ;dngos grub thams cad gnas pa yin //
translated: all accomplishments will be present.🔽Oṃ vajraheruka, I take refuge in you,

original: aom badzra he ru ka sa ma ya ma nu p'a la ya badzra he ru ka /🔽tve no pa tishtha /🔽dri dho me bha ba /
analyzed: aom badzra he ru ka sa ma ya ma nu p'a la ya badzra he ru ka / tve no pa tishtha / dri dho me bha ba /
translated: Vajraheruka,🔽be firm,

original: su toshyo me bha ba /🔽aa nu rakto me bha bha ba; ;su po shyo me bha ba /
analyzed: su toshyo me bha ba / aa nu rakto me bha bha ba; ;su po shyo me bha ba /
translated: be steady,

original: sarba siddhi mme pra yatstsha /
analyzed: sarba siddhi mme pra yatstsha /
translated: be well pleased with me,🔽be favorably inclined toward me,🔽grant me all accomplishments,

original: sarba karma su tsa me tsittam shri ya: ku ru h'um/
analyzed: sarba karma su tsa me tsittam shri ya: ku ru h'um/
translated: make my mind well disposed toward all actions, hūṃ.

original: ha ha ha ha ho //
analyzed: ha ha ha ha ho //
translated: Ha ha ha ha hoḥ.

original: badzra he ru ka m'a me munytsa he ru ka bha ba /
analyzed: badzra he ru ka m'a me munytsa he ru ka bha ba /
translated: Vajraheruka, do not abandon me, make me into Heruka.

original: ma h'a sa ma ya satva aa: h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: ma h'a sa ma ya satva aa: h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Great samaya being, svāhā.

original: 'di ni bcom ldan kun khyab cing //
analyzed: 'di ni bcom ldan kun khyab cing //
translated: This is the all-pervading Bhagavān,

original: yi ge brgya pa mchog gyur pa //
analyzed: yi ge brgya pa mchog gyur pa //
translated: the supreme hundred syllables,

original: he ru ka mchog rang nyid yin //
analyzed: he ru ka mchog rang nyid yin //
translated: the supreme Heruka himself.

original: phyir zlog pa ni gang yin pa //
analyzed: phyir zlog pa ni gang yin pa //
translated: Whatever is to be repelled

original: bcu drug 'dab ma la bkod cing //
analyzed: bcu drug 'dab ma la bkod cing //
translated: is arranged on the sixteen petals.

original: rjes su bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor kun //
analyzed: rjes su bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor kun //
translated: All the maṇḍalas of instruction

original: bdag gis bsgoms shing brtan par bya //
analyzed: bdag gis bsgoms shing brtan par bya //
translated: are meditated and stabilized by me.

original: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
translated: With the yoga of one’s deity,

original: ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya //
analyzed: ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya //
translated: one should remain as is comfortable.

original: rnal 'byor 'di 'dra bsgoms na ni //
analyzed: rnal 'byor 'di 'dra bsgoms na ni //
translated: If one meditates on this kind of yoga,

original: khams gsum pa yang mthong 'gyur te //
analyzed: khams gsum pa yang mthong 'gyur te //
translated: one will see the three realms.

original: bdag nyid dpa' bo'i mtshan nyid de //
analyzed: bdag nyid dpa' bo'i mtshan nyid de //
translated: The characteristics of the hero himself

original: de ltar srid ba'ang stong pa yin //
analyzed: de ltar srid ba'ang stong pa yin //
translated: are also empty in that way.

original: bsgoms @232b bas bdag nyid yang dag gnas //
analyzed: bsgoms @232b bas bdag nyid yang dag gnas //
translated: Meditating, one remains in reality.

original: 'dir ni dka' thub bshad pa med //
analyzed: 'dir ni dka' thub bshad pa med //
translated: Here there is no explanation of austerities.

original: phreng ba med cing sngags kyang med //
analyzed: phreng ba med cing sngags kyang med //
translated: There are no rosaries or mantras.

original: gzungs dang sbyin sreg las rnams dang // cho ga'i rim pa'i gzhi yang med //
analyzed: gzungs dang sbyin sreg las rnams dang // cho ga'i rim pa'i gzhi yang med //
translated: There is no dhāraṇī, no burnt offerings, no activities, and no basis for the stages of rites.

original: rnal 'byor phyag rgya byed pa'ang med //
analyzed: rnal 'byor phyag rgya byed pa'ang med //
translated: There is no yoga, no mudrā practice,

original: g-yas brkyang zhabs kyi rim pa'ang med //
analyzed: g-yas brkyang zhabs kyi rim pa'ang med //
translated: and no sequence of right-side-up and upside-down.

original: rdo rje chen po dngos 'dzin pa //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po dngos 'dzin pa //
translated: The great vajra is not grasped as real,

original: rang byung dngos grub kun mdzad pa //
analyzed: rang byung dngos grub kun mdzad pa //
translated: and the self-originated one accomplishes all powers.

original: 'gog pa nyid kyang mdzad pa med //
analyzed: 'gog pa nyid kyang mdzad pa med //
translated: Even cessation is not accomplished.

original: bdag nyid bdag gis mchod par bya //
analyzed: bdag nyid bdag gis mchod par bya //
translated: One should make offerings to oneself by oneself.

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang ba ni //
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang ba ni //
translated: The full moon maṇḍala

original: lte ba'i dbus su rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: lte ba'i dbus su rnam par bsgom //
translated: is visualized in the center of the navel.

original: yi ge gnas kyi mchog gyur pa //
analyzed: yi ge gnas kyi mchog gyur pa //
translated: The supreme abode of the syllables

original: lha yi gzugs su sgom pa ni //
analyzed: lha yi gzugs su sgom pa ni //
translated: is visualized in the form of a deity.

original: de yi dbus su rnam par bsam //
analyzed: de yi dbus su rnam par bsam //
translated: One should visualize it in the center of that.

original: sku gsung thugs ni 'dus pa can //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs ni 'dus pa can //
translated: It is endowed with the gathering of body, speech, and mind.

original: de yi lus las 'das gyur te //
analyzed: de yi lus las 'das gyur te //
translated: Having transcended the body,

original: sems kyi dngos kyang btsal du med //
analyzed: sems kyi dngos kyang btsal du med //
translated: the entity of the mind is also not sought.

original: chags pa med cing chags bral med //

original: rang rig lus dang yang dag 'dus //
analyzed: rang rig lus dang yang dag 'dus //

analyzed: gnas la sogs pa'i rim sbyor ba //

analyzed: sdom pa gsum gyi mchog dam pa //

translated: The mantra, likewise, is recalled.🔽Om am aam, im iim,🔽umuum, e ai,

analyzed: aum a'um/ ae aee / aam aa: sha sv'a h'a khams dang phung po skye mched la //
translated: am a:, sha svaha.

original: go cha rnams ni sbyar bar bya //
analyzed: go cha rnams ni sbyar bar bya //
translated: The armor is applied to the elements, aggregates, and sense bases.🔽The wisdom wheel, the pledge,

original: ye shes 'khor lo dam tshig dang // mnyam pa'i ro yis mchod par bya //
analyzed: ye shes 'khor lo dam tshig dang // mnyam pa'i ro yis mchod par bya //
translated: And the offering of the taste of equality.

original: mchod pa bzhi po'i gsang sngags rnams; ;rang ming gsal byed h'um byas te //
analyzed: mchod pa bzhi po'i gsang sngags rnams; ;rang ming gsal byed h'um byas te //
translated: are their names with the addition of hūṃ.

original: 'di ltar dkyil 'khor dag dang sbyar //
analyzed: 'di ltar dkyil 'khor dag dang sbyar //
translated: Thus they are applied to the maṇḍala.🔽The vajra ornaments are worn,

original: sangs rgyas thod pa las byung ba //🔽rdo rje rgyan ni bgos pa ste //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thod pa las byung ba // rdo rje rgyan ni bgos pa ste //
translated: arising from the Buddha’s skull-cup.🔽Everything is applied in sequence,

original: thams cad rim pa bzhin du sbyar; ;'thor 'thung du ni rab sbyar bas //
analyzed: thams cad rim pa bzhin du sbyar; ;'thor 'thung du ni rab sbyar bas //
translated: and the sprinkling water is applied as well.

original: gsang ba bzhi po bzla bar bya //
analyzed: gsang ba bzhi po bzla bar bya //
translated: The four secrets should be recited.

original: spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis //🔽'khor lo gsum gyi rim pa dang // 'dir ni cho ga'i sbyor ba yis; ;dus bzhi dag tu sbyar nas su //
analyzed: spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis // 'khor lo gsum gyi rim pa dang // 'dir ni cho ga'i sbyor ba yis; ;dus bzhi dag tu sbyar nas su //
translated: Through the yoga of emanating and gathering,🔽and through the sequence of the three cakras,🔽here, through the application of the rite,🔽one should recite the pledge wheel

original: dam tshig 'khor lo'i bzlas pa bya //
analyzed: dam tshig 'khor lo'i bzlas pa bya //
translated: in the four periods of the day.

original: dam tshig mchog ni dngos grub 'gyur //
analyzed: dam tshig mchog ni dngos grub 'gyur //
translated: The supreme pledge is the attainment.

original: dam tshig can gyi gsang sngags kun //
analyzed: dam tshig can gyi gsang sngags kun //
translated: All the secret mantras of the pledge

original: sangs rgyas thod pa mchog yin te //🔽mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thod pa mchog yin te // mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba yis //
translated: are the supreme Buddha’s skull-cup.

original: 'di ltar thams cad rab tu brtag /
analyzed: 'di ltar thams cad rab tu brtag /
translated: Thus everything should be imagined🔽through the yoga of being in equipoise.

original: dam tshig rtag tu bskyang bya zhing //
analyzed: dam tshig rtag tu bskyang bya zhing //
translated: The pledge should always be maintained,

original: ye shes 'chi med lnga yi mchog /
analyzed: ye shes 'chi med lnga yi mchog /
translated: and the five nectars of immortality are supreme.

original: yang na rang ming bzlas pa bya //
analyzed: yang na rang ming bzlas pa bya //
translated: Or else one should recite one's own name.

original: sngags kyi de nyid bzlas par bya //
analyzed: sngags kyi de nyid bzlas par bya //
translated: One should recite the reality of the mantra.

original: aom shr'i buddha ka p'a li brum a'a: h'um d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ram h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i buddha ka p'a li brum a'a: h'um d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ram h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Om shri buddha kapali bhrum a: hum dakini jvala sambaram hum phat svāhā.

original: 'di ni yid 'ong sbyor ba'i mchog /
analyzed: 'di ni yid 'ong sbyor ba'i mchog /
translated: This is the supreme union of the delightful.

original: rnal 'byor @235b ma yi ye shes mchog /
analyzed: rnal 'byor @235b ma yi ye shes mchog /

original: gang du dam tshig nyams pa la //
analyzed: gang du dam tshig nyams pa la //
translated: Where the samaya is impaired,

original: sbyor ba 'di ni sbyin par bya //
analyzed: sbyor ba 'di ni sbyin par bya //

original: zhi bar gyur nas bla med pa //
analyzed: zhi bar gyur nas bla med pa //
translated: Having become peaceful,

original: rnal 'byor me yis dbang yang bskur //
analyzed: rnal 'byor me yis dbang yang bskur //

original: dus bzhi dag tu rim pa yis //
analyzed: dus bzhi dag tu rim pa yis //
translated: In the four times, by stages,

original: phyi dang nang gi chus khrus bya //
analyzed: phyi dang nang gi chus khrus bya //
translated: The outer and inner ablutions are performed.

original: yang na dam tshig sdom pa blang //
analyzed: yang na dam tshig sdom pa blang //

original: bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab //
analyzed: bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab //

original: bdag ni mi shes rmongs pa ste //
analyzed: bdag ni mi shes rmongs pa ste //
translated: I am ignorant and confused,

original: dam tshig las ni 'gal zhing nyams //
analyzed: dam tshig las ni 'gal zhing nyams //

original: bla ma mgon pos skyabs mdzod cig /
analyzed: bla ma mgon pos skyabs mdzod cig /

original: gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa ste //
analyzed: gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa ste //
translated: The chief vajra holder,

original: thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can //
analyzed: thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can //

original: 'gro ba'i gtso la skyabs su mchi //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i gtso la skyabs su mchi //

original: des ni the tshom med byas nas //
analyzed: des ni the tshom med byas nas //
translated: Having made that without doubt,

original: nges par dngos grub can du 'gyur //🔽mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
analyzed: nges par dngos grub can du 'gyur // mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
translated: one will certainly become a master of spiritual powers.

original: dam tshig las ldang ba sangs rgyas thod pa bskyed pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o ////
analyzed: dam tshig las ldang ba sangs rgyas thod pa bskyed pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o ////
translated: This concludes the twenty-sixth chapter of the Supreme Tantra of Clear Expression, called “The Arising of the Buddha’s Skull from the Observance of the Vows.”

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, moreover, I will explain

original: gsang ba'i de nyid rnyed dka' ba //
analyzed: gsang ba'i de nyid rnyed dka' ba //
translated: the reality of the secret that is difficult to attain.🔽The generation of all mantras,🔽the abode and movement of beings,

original: gsang sngags kun ni bskyed pa dang // 'gro ba'i gnas dang 'gro ba dang // rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo kun //
analyzed: gsang sngags kun ni bskyed pa dang // 'gro ba'i gnas dang 'gro ba dang // rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo kun //
translated: all yoginīs and heroes,

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas mchog yin //🔽mi zad gnyis med rnam par dag /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas mchog yin // mi zad gnyis med rnam par dag /
translated: are the supreme abode of the buddhas.🔽The imperishable, nondual, pure,

original: thog ma dbus mthar dri ma med //
analyzed: thog ma dbus mthar dri ma med //
translated: beginningless, endless, stainless,

original: aa yi ye shes las byung ba //
analyzed: aa yi ye shes las byung ba //
translated: arisen from the wisdom of A,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che //
translated: is Vajrasattva, the great bliss.

original: zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste //
analyzed: zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste //

original: spyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i nyams //
analyzed: spyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i nyams //
translated: with three eyes, and the expression of compassion.

original: phyag rgya che dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: phyag rgya che dang yang dag ldan //
translated: Endowed with the great seal,

original: rang bzhin dag cing @236a *//
analyzed: rang bzhin dag cing @236a *//
translated: he is pure by nature,

original: dri ma med //
analyzed: dri ma med //
translated: and stainless.

analyzed: ral pa zla phyed dbu la brgyan // sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mtshan //

original: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can //
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can //

original: sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan //

original: sems dpa' skyil mo krung gis bzhugs //
analyzed: sems dpa' skyil mo krung gis bzhugs //

original: phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan //

original: rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan //

original: ral gri lcags kyu phyag na bsnams //
analyzed: ral gri lcags kyu phyag na bsnams //

original: rin chen zhags pa mdzes pa 'dzin //
analyzed: rin chen zhags pa mdzes pa 'dzin //

original: dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol //

original: dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba'i zhal //
analyzed: dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba'i zhal //

original: rnam thar gsum gyi gnas kyi mchog /
analyzed: rnam thar gsum gyi gnas kyi mchog /

original: ye shes sems dpa' snying ga ru //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' snying ga ru //

original: 'khor lo gsum gyi mchog kyang sgom //
analyzed: 'khor lo gsum gyi mchog kyang sgom //

original: h'um las thugs kyi 'khor lo ste //
analyzed: h'um las thugs kyi 'khor lo ste //

analyzed: de yi phyag mtshan sngon po dang // a'a: las gsung gi 'khor lo ste //

analyzed: de yi phyag mtshan dmar po 'o //

original: aom las sku yi 'khor lo ste //
analyzed: aom las sku yi 'khor lo ste //

original: de yi phyag mtshan dkar po yin //
analyzed: de yi phyag mtshan dkar po yin //

original: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mnyam sbyor //
analyzed: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mnyam sbyor //

original: sku gsung thugs ni dri ma med //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs ni dri ma med //

original: ram las phyag rgya chen po ste //
analyzed: ram las phyag rgya chen po ste //

original: lte ba'i dbus su rnam par bsam //
analyzed: lte ba'i dbus su rnam par bsam //

original: ai las bha ga padma ste //
analyzed: ai las bha ga padma ste //

analyzed: byang chub zla ba dri ma med //

original: au ni snying gar bsam pa ste //
analyzed: au ni snying gar bsam pa ste //

analyzed: ae ni mgo la rnam par dgod; ;ae ni spyi gtsug dag tu dgod //

analyzed: aam ni mig tu dgod pa ste //

analyzed: ai ni go char byas nas su //

original: aa ni mdun gyi mtshon cha'o //
analyzed: aa ni mdun gyi mtshon cha'o //

analyzed: l'i las lha mo gos dkar mo //

analyzed: r'i las rin chen yang dag 'byung //

analyzed: rin chen sgron dang ye shes sgron //

original: dkar zhing pa la sha yi mdog /
analyzed: dkar zhing pa la sha yi mdog /

analyzed: dmar zhing dzam bu chu bo'i mdog /

original: zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa //
analyzed: zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa //

original: spyan gsum dgyes pas rnam par myos //
analyzed: spyan gsum dgyes pas rnam par myos //

original: thams cad phyogs kyis gos can te //
analyzed: thams cad phyogs kyis gos can te //

analyzed: 'dod pa thams cad rab tu stsol //

analyzed: ral gri mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin //

analyzed: gzhu ni 'gugs par 'dzin pa ste //

analyzed: thod pa yi ni cod pan can //

analyzed: de dag sgo ru dgod pa ste //

original: dbus su gtso bo'i zla ba'i gdan //

analyzed: zur la mchod pa rnam pa bzhi //

analyzed: zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa //

analyzed: sbyan gsum thod pa'i phreng ba can //

analyzed: chang gi btung ba lag pas mchod //

analyzed: skyil krung phyed par legs par bzhugs //

analyzed: 'di lta'i cho gas @237a *//

analyzed: thams cad mkhyen //

analyzed: a'a li de nyid dri ma med //

original: gsang ba mchog ni rnyed dka' ba //
analyzed: gsang ba mchog ni rnyed dka' ba //

original: rdo rje sems dpa' bshad pa yin //

analyzed: sngags kyi de nyid cho ga dag /

original: sku gsung thugs su yang dag sbyar //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs su yang dag sbyar //

analyzed: aom shr'i ma h'a su kha badzra sa tva aa a'a: h'um d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ram sv'ah'a /

analyzed: aom siddhi lo tsa n'i li a'a: h'um sv'ah'a /

analyzed: aom sa ma ya t'a re tutta re tu re ri a'a: h'um sv'ah'a /

analyzed: aom padmo ddha we p'anda ra ba si ni si li a'a: h'um sv'ah'a /

analyzed: aom ratna ku la ke ka ratna dz'a li n'i r'i a'a: h'um sv'ah'a /

analyzed: aom r'u pa badzri brum/

analyzed: gang gis dngos po kun gsang ba //

translated: is explained as the secret.🔽The yogī should be endowed with

original: ye shes 'khor lo mthong nas ni //

original: de dag gcig tu bstims nas su //

translated: Having meditated one-pointedly,🔽one will quickly attain the power

original: dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur //🔽nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
analyzed: dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur // nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
translated: of the three wheels, the secret dakini.

original: ksha'i mkha' 'gro sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o ////
analyzed: ksha'i mkha' 'gro sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o ////
translated: This concludes the twenty-ninth chapter of the Supreme Tantra of the Supreme Original Buddha, the exalted Bhagavān, called the “Chapter on the Practice of the Ḍākinīs of the Kṣa Letter.”🔽CHAPTER THIRTY🔽The Practice of the Ḍākinīs of the Ā Letter

original: de nas mchog tu bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas mchog tu bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, the supreme one to be explained

original: a'a li mkha' 'gro sgrub pa ste //
analyzed: a'a li mkha' 'gro sgrub pa ste //
translated: is the practice of the ḍākinīs of the ā letter.

original: a'a li ye shes las byung ba //
analyzed: a'a li ye shes las byung ba //
translated: The ḍākinīs of the ā letter arise from gnosis.

original: a'a li mkha' 'gro mchog dam pa //
analyzed: a'a li mkha' 'gro mchog dam pa //
translated: The ḍākinīs of the ā letter are the supreme sublime ones.

original: zhal brgyad pa la phyag bcu drug /
analyzed: zhal brgyad pa la phyag bcu drug /
translated: They have eight faces and sixteen arms.

original: spyan gsum @240a *//
analyzed: spyan gsum @240a *//
translated: They have three eyes.

original: 'jigs pa rab 'jigs pa //
analyzed: 'jigs pa rab 'jigs pa //
translated: They are terrifying and very frightening.

original: zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs //
analyzed: zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs //
translated: Their faces bare their fangs.

original: g-yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs //
analyzed: g-yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs //
translated: They stand with their right legs extended.

original: zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'chang //🔽thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'chang // thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
translated: They wear half-moon topknots.🔽They are adorned with garlands of skulls.

original: sna tshogs rdo rjes spyi gtsug mnan //
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rjes spyi gtsug mnan //
translated: They press down on their crowns with crossed vajras.

original: dpral ba la ni rdo rje phreng //
analyzed: dpral ba la ni rdo rje phreng //
translated: They have vajra garlands on their foreheads.

original: stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs //
analyzed: stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs //
translated: He wears a tiger skin as a garment.

original: phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan //
analyzed: phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan //
translated: His body is adorned with the six symbolic ornaments.

original: rnam par rtog pa 'jigs byed nyid //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa 'jigs byed nyid //
translated: He is the very terror of conceptualization.

original: sred dang phrag dog dus mtshan nyid //
analyzed: sred dang phrag dog dus mtshan nyid //
translated: He tramples upon craving and jealousy.

original: zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon par mdzad //
analyzed: zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon par mdzad //
translated: He tramples under his feet the god and the demon.

original: gdul dka' thams cad 'dul mdzad cing //
analyzed: gdul dka' thams cad 'dul mdzad cing //
translated: He is the subduer of all the difficult to subdue.

original: bgegs kyi mgo bo'i phreng ba can //
analyzed: bgegs kyi mgo bo'i phreng ba can //
translated: He has a garland of the heads of obstacles.

original: sna tshogs mdog can legs par mdzes //
analyzed: sna tshogs mdog can legs par mdzes //
translated: He is well adorned with various colors.

original: dkar ba'i mdog can sked pa phra //
analyzed: dkar ba'i mdog can sked pa phra //
translated: He has a white color and a slender waist.

original: lha yi gzi brjid 'bar ba can //
analyzed: lha yi gzi brjid 'bar ba can //
translated: He has the blazing splendor of a god.

original: sngo zhing ser la dud ka dang // g-yas pa'i zhal yang de bzhin te //
analyzed: sngo zhing ser la dud ka dang // g-yas pa'i zhal yang de bzhin te //
translated: His right face is blue, yellow, and smoke-colored.

original: ljang gu dmar dang ser skya ste //
analyzed: ljang gu dmar dang ser skya ste //
translated: His left face is green, red, and pale yellow.

original: g-yon pa'i zhal yang sna tshogs mdzes //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i zhal yang sna tshogs mdzes //
translated: It is also well adorned with various colors.

original: steng gi thal kha sprin mdog zhi //
analyzed: steng gi thal kha sprin mdog zhi //
translated: His upper face is the color of saffron.

original: chags shing rjes su chags pas lta //
analyzed: chags shing rjes su chags pas lta //
translated: He gazes with passion and affection.

original: thugs rje'i ro ni yang dag rdzogs //
analyzed: thugs rje'i ro ni yang dag rdzogs //
translated: He is the perfect embodiment of the taste of compassion.

original: sku lus ldem zhing 'dzo bag can //
analyzed: sku lus ldem zhing 'dzo bag can //
translated: His body is supple and graceful.

original: a'a li mkha' 'gro ma yi sku //
analyzed: a'a li mkha' 'gro ma yi sku //
translated: He is the embodiment of the ḍākinīs of the a-li.

original: phyag gnyis pa la gcer bu'i lus; ;thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la brgyan //
analyzed: phyag gnyis pa la gcer bu'i lus; ;thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la brgyan //
translated: his head adorned with a garland of skulls.

original: skra grol ba yis rnam par myos //
analyzed: skra grol ba yis rnam par myos //
translated: He is intoxicated by his loose hair.

original: spyan gsum nag po 'jigs pa can //
analyzed: spyan gsum nag po 'jigs pa can //
translated: He has three eyes, is black, and terrifying.

original: de yi mdog can ska rags can //
analyzed: de yi mdog can ska rags can //
translated: He has a belt the same color as himself.

original: byin pa gnyis @240b kyis legs par 'khril //
analyzed: byin pa gnyis @240b kyis legs par 'khril //
translated: He is well wrapped with the two thighs.

original: gnyis med sbyor bas yang dag gnas //
analyzed: gnyis med sbyor bas yang dag gnas //
translated: He is situated in the union of nonduality.

original: rdo rje dril bu yang dag ldan //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu yang dag ldan //
translated: He is endowed with the vajra and the bell.

original: lha mo'i ku tsa 'tshir ba'o //🔽ji ltar mkha' 'gro'i phyag rgya ltar //
analyzed: lha mo'i ku tsa 'tshir ba'o // ji ltar mkha' 'gro'i phyag rgya ltar //
translated: He bites the goddess’s kuca.🔽Just as the dakinis’ mudra,

original: mkha' 'grom yang de bzhin sbyar //
analyzed: mkha' 'grom yang de bzhin sbyar //
translated: the dakinis are also applied in the same way.

original: phyag gnyis dag ni brkyang ba la //🔽khyab 'jug pags pa mnabs pa yin //🔽thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
analyzed: phyag gnyis dag ni brkyang ba la // khyab 'jug pags pa mnabs pa yin // thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
translated: With the two arms extended,🔽he wears the skin of Viṣṇu.🔽He holds a skull cup and khaṭvāṅga.

original: ral gri dang ni thod pa 'chang //
analyzed: ral gri dang ni thod pa 'chang //
translated: He holds a sword and a skull cup.

original: mdung rtse gsum pa cang te'u nyid //
analyzed: mdung rtse gsum pa cang te'u nyid //
translated: He holds a trident and a ḍamaru.

original: dgra sta lcags gyu de bzhin te //
analyzed: dgra sta lcags gyu de bzhin te //
translated: He holds an axe and a chain,🔽as well as a noose and Brahmā’s head,

original: zhags pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang // gri gug dang ni 'khor lo nyid //
analyzed: zhags pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang // gri gug dang ni 'khor lo nyid //
translated: a flaying knife and a chakram.

original: snying gar rtsibs ni bcu gnyis pa'i //
analyzed: snying gar rtsibs ni bcu gnyis pa'i //
translated: In the heart is a twelve-spoked wheel.

original: 'khor lo'i rgyal po legs par mdzes //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i rgyal po legs par mdzes //
translated: The king of wheels is well-adorned.

original: de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni //
analyzed: de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni //
translated: In the center of its hub

original: ye shes mkha' 'gro rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: ye shes mkha' 'gro rnam par bsgom //
translated: one should visualize the Gnosis dakini.🔽Her color, face, posture,🔽hands, and implements are the same,

original: de mdog zhal dang 'dug stangs dang // phyag dang phyag rgya de bzhin te; ;shar du dam tshig mchog ces bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yi ge aa'i rigs las byung ba'o //
analyzed: de mdog zhal dang 'dug stangs dang // phyag dang phyag rgya de bzhin te; ;shar du dam tshig mchog ces bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yi ge aa'i rigs las byung ba'o //
translated: In the east, the dakini Vajraḍāka, born from the syllable A, is called “Supreme Commitment.”

original: byang phyogs su sna tshogs mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge a'i las gyur te bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: byang phyogs su sna tshogs mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge a'i las gyur te bzhugs pa'o //
translated: In the north, the dakini called “Supreme Variety,” born from the syllable A, is present.

original: nub phyogs su nam mkha'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge ae dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: nub phyogs su nam mkha'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge ae dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: In the west, the dakini called “Supreme Space,” born from the syllable Ai, is to be combined.

original: lho phyogs su gnas kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge aee las yang dag par bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: lho phyogs su gnas kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge aee las yang dag par bzhugs pa'o //
translated: In the south, the dakini called “Supreme Abode,” born from the syllable Ai, is perfectly present.

original: me'i phyogs la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su mkha' 'gro ma bzhi po dgod par bya ste /
analyzed: me'i phyogs la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su mkha' 'gro ma bzhi po dgod par bya ste /
translated: In the intermediate directions beginning with the southeast, one should arrange the four dakinis.

original: thog ma che ba'i mchog ce @241a *//
analyzed: thog ma che ba'i mchog ce @241a *//
translated: First, the dakini called “Supreme Greatness,” born from the syllable O, is present.

original: bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge au dang sbyar bya'o //🔽bden bral du drag po mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge a'u dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge au dang sbyar bya'o // bden bral du drag po mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge a'u dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The dakini called “the best of actions” is associated with the letter u.🔽The dakini called “the best of wrathful ones” is associated with the letter ū.

original: rlung gi phyogs su dpa' bo'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge ao dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: rlung gi phyogs su dpa' bo'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge ao dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The dakini called “the best of heroes” is associated with the letter o.

original: dbang ldan du khro bo'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge aoo dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbang ldan du khro bo'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge aoo dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The dakini called “the best of wrathful ones” is associated with the letter au.

original: de bzhin 'dis ni mtshams bzhi ru //🔽dbang ldan la sogs phyogs dgod pa //
analyzed: de bzhin 'dis ni mtshams bzhi ru // dbang ldan la sogs phyogs dgod pa //
translated: In the same way, in the four intermediate directions,🔽the dakini called “the best of accomplishments” is associated with the letter ri,🔽the dakini called “the best of charnel grounds” is associated with the letter li,🔽the dakini called “the best of yogins” is associated with the letter ri,

original: yi ge ri las dngos grub kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / yi ge li las dur khrod kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / yi ge r'i las rnal 'byor gyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / yi ge l'i las gtum pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang /🔽mkha' 'gro ma ni de kun gyi //
analyzed: yi ge ri las dngos grub kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / yi ge li las dur khrod kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / yi ge r'i las rnal 'byor gyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / yi ge l'i las gtum pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang /🔽mkha' 'gro ma ni de kun gyi //
translated: and the dakini called “the best of fierce ones” is associated with the letter li.

original: yan lag bcu gnyis rnam par dag /
analyzed: yan lag bcu gnyis rnam par dag /
translated: And the twelve branches are pure.

original: zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste //
analyzed: zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste //
translated: He has three faces and six arms,

original: thams cad spyan gsum rnam sgyur la //
analyzed: thams cad spyan gsum rnam sgyur la //
translated: all with three eyes, and a wrathful expression.

original: sku lus dkar po thams cad zhal //
analyzed: sku lus dkar po thams cad zhal //
translated: His body is white, and all his faces

original: sngo dang ljang gu gnyis med bde //🔽g-yon dang g-yas pa'i zhal gnyis ni //
analyzed: sngo dang ljang gu gnyis med bde // g-yon dang g-yas pa'i zhal gnyis ni //
translated: are blue and green, blissful without duality.

original: mkhas pas rnam par bsgom par bya //
analyzed: mkhas pas rnam par bsgom par bya //
translated: The wise one should visualize🔽the two faces, right and left.

original: phyogs kyi gos can gar dang bcas //
analyzed: phyogs kyi gos can gar dang bcas //
translated: He wears the skirt of the directions,

original: skra grol ba la rab tu 'jigs //🔽thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //🔽cang te'u dang ni gri gug mchog /
analyzed: skra grol ba la rab tu 'jigs // thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin // cang te'u dang ni gri gug mchog /
translated: with loose hair, and is very frightening.🔽He holds a skull cup and khaṭvāṅga,🔽and a ḍamaru and flaying knife.

original: mdung dang mgo @241b po thams cad kun //
analyzed: mdung dang mgo @241b po thams cad kun //
translated: He holds a spear and all the heads,

original: sna tshogs mdog dang phyag mtshan bsnams //
analyzed: sna tshogs mdog dang phyag mtshan bsnams //
translated: with various colors and implements.

original: ro yi mgo yi steng bzhugs shing //
analyzed: ro yi mgo yi steng bzhugs shing //
translated: He sits on a corpse seat,

original: thugs rje'i ro ni yongs su rdzogs //
analyzed: thugs rje'i ro ni yongs su rdzogs //
translated: with the taste of compassion complete.

original: phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa ste //
analyzed: phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa ste //
translated: He holds the five symbolic ornaments

original: thams cad thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan //
analyzed: thams cad thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan //
translated: and is adorned with a garland of skulls.

original: mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin pa ste //
analyzed: mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin pa ste //
translated: He holds a garland of heads

original: thams cad aa la la yi sgra //
analyzed: thams cad aa la la yi sgra //
translated: and makes the sound “ha ha.”

original: aom ni thugs kyi rdo rje ste //
analyzed: aom ni thugs kyi rdo rje ste //
translated: Oṃ is the vajra mind,

original: a'a: ni gsung du 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: a'a: ni gsung du 'gyur ba yin //
translated: Aḥ is the speech.

original: aa ni sku yi rdo rje ste //
analyzed: aa ni sku yi rdo rje ste //
translated: A is the vajra body.

original: rdo rje padma 'khor lo'i dbus //
analyzed: rdo rje padma 'khor lo'i dbus //
translated: In the middle of the vajra, lotus, and wheel,

original: 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba ste //
analyzed: 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba ste //
translated: this is the supreme secret.

original: rnal 'byor ma yi sbyor ba mchog /🔽rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa ste //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi sbyor ba mchog / rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa ste //
translated: The supreme yoga of the yoginīs,🔽is spoken by Vajrasattva,

original: rdo rje snying pos zhus pa yin //
analyzed: rdo rje snying pos zhus pa yin //
translated: and requested by Vajra Essence.

original: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i mkha' 'gro ma //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i mkha' 'gro ma //
translated: The ḍākinīs of the maṇḍala wheel

original: 'khor la sogs pa thams cad dgod //
analyzed: 'khor la sogs pa thams cad dgod //
translated: are placed in all the retinue and so forth.

original: ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas //
analyzed: ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas //
translated: Having seen that wheel of pristine consciousness,

original: gcig pu chos kyi ro yang bsgom //
analyzed: gcig pu chos kyi ro yang bsgom //
translated: meditate on the taste of the Dharma alone.

original: ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: Through the yoga of the repetition of pristine consciousness,

original: rang gi sngags kyi 'thor 'thung bya //
analyzed: rang gi sngags kyi 'thor 'thung bya //
translated: one should perform the bali offering of one’s mantra.

original: nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas //
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas //
translated: Endowed with the yoga of the inner nature,

original: 'khor lo mchog gi tshogs dang spro //
analyzed: 'khor lo mchog gi tshogs dang spro //
translated: one should emanate the supreme wheel and the assembly.

original: mchog de mthong na slar yang bsdu //🔽yan lag bcu gnyis mchog dam pa //
analyzed: mchog de mthong na slar yang bsdu // yan lag bcu gnyis mchog dam pa //
translated: When one sees that supreme one, gather it back.🔽The supreme twelve branches

original: sa ni bcu gnyis dag nyid de //
analyzed: sa ni bcu gnyis dag nyid de //
translated: are the twelve stages.

original: rdo rje sa ni bcu gsum pa //
analyzed: rdo rje sa ni bcu gsum pa //
translated: The vajra stage is the thirteenth.

original: rab tu dga' dang dri ma med //
analyzed: rab tu dga' dang dri ma med //
translated: Supreme joy and stainless,

original: 'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro ba //
analyzed: 'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro ba //
translated: luminous, and radiating light,

original: spyang dka' ba dang mngon du gyur //
analyzed: spyang dka' ba dang mngon du gyur //
translated: Difficult to purify and manifest,

original: ring du song dang mi g-yo ba //
analyzed: ring du song dang mi g-yo ba //
translated: Gone far, immovable,

original: legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin //
analyzed: legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin //
translated: Excellent wisdom, cloud of Dharma,

original: gzugs med pa dang ye shes ldan //
analyzed: gzugs med pa dang ye shes ldan //
translated: Formless, endowed with wisdom.

original: de ltar sa ni bcu gnyis po //
analyzed: de ltar sa ni bcu gnyis po //
translated: Thus, the twelve stages

original: 'khor @242a *// lo'i lha mo rnam par dgod //
analyzed: 'khor @242a *// lo'i lha mo rnam par dgod //
translated: Are arranged as goddesses of the wheel.

original: dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i rdo rje sems dpas dbus su'o //
analyzed: dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i rdo rje sems dpas dbus su'o //
translated: The great joy, supreme bliss, called Vajrasattva, is in the center.🔽The mantras of all the retinue and so forth,

original: 'khor la sogs pa kun gyi sngags; ;ming dang gsal byed h'um byas te //
analyzed: 'khor la sogs pa kun gyi sngags; ;ming dang gsal byed h'um byas te //
translated: With name and consonants, are made into hūṃs,

original: de dag mthar ni phat dang sbyar //
analyzed: de dag mthar ni phat dang sbyar //
translated: And at the end, they are joined with phaṭ.

original: sngags kyi gtso bos gsang sngags ni //
analyzed: sngags kyi gtso bos gsang sngags ni //
translated: The principal mantra is the mantra

original: rang snying rang gi sa bon dgod //
analyzed: rang snying rang gi sa bon dgod //
translated: Arranged in one’s heart, one’s seed syllable.

original: sku gsung thugs dang rnam par sbyar //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs dang rnam par sbyar //
translated: It is applied to body, speech, and mind.

original: ye shes 'khor lo 'di mthong nas //
analyzed: ye shes 'khor lo 'di mthong nas //
translated: Having seen this wheel of wisdom,

original: gcig tu bsdus te mchod par bya //🔽bdag gis phyi dang nang du yang //
analyzed: gcig tu bsdus te mchod par bya // bdag gis phyi dang nang du yang //
translated: One should gather it into one and make offerings.🔽One should recite silently,🔽Meditating on oneself and the other

original: mnyam par bzhag ste mi smra bzla //
analyzed: mnyam par bzhag ste mi smra bzla //
translated: As the deity, without inner or outer.

original: rang gi 'thor 'thung byas nas ni //
analyzed: rang gi 'thor 'thung byas nas ni //
translated: Having performed one’s own bali and drinking water,

original: blo ldan srog rtsol bzlas pa bya //
analyzed: blo ldan srog rtsol bzlas pa bya //
translated: The wise one should perform the repetition of prāṇāyāma.

original: aom shr'i a'a li d'a ka aa aam d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ram h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i a'a li d'a ka aa aam d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ram h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ śrī ālī dāka a aṃ ḍākinī jāla śambaraṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: srid pa ma lus thams cad kun //
analyzed: srid pa ma lus thams cad kun //
translated: All of existence without exception

original: dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te //
translated: Is of the nature of non-entity.

original: sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag nyid //
analyzed: sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag nyid //
translated: The nature of mantra, shape, and reality

original: sbyor ba yi ni bdag nyid rnams //
analyzed: sbyor ba yi ni bdag nyid rnams //
translated: Is the nature of union.

original: sems can khams ni cha gnas pas //
analyzed: sems can khams ni cha gnas pas //
translated: Abiding in the realm of sentient beings,

original: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
translated: Through the union with one's deity,

original: bdag nyid sbyor zhing mchod par bya //
analyzed: bdag nyid sbyor zhing mchod par bya //

original: mnyam par ma bzhag sems kyis ni //
analyzed: mnyam par ma bzhag sems kyis ni //
translated: With a mind that is not in equipoise,

original: sgom zhing rab tu bsgoms byas te //
analyzed: sgom zhing rab tu bsgoms byas te //
translated: One should meditate and cultivate well.🔽The mantra, shape, and reality

original: sngags dang dbyibs dang chos nyid de; ;chos gcig ro ni stong pa yin //
analyzed: sngags dang dbyibs dang chos nyid de; ;chos gcig ro ni stong pa yin //

original: chos rnams bdag med nyid yin te //
analyzed: chos rnams bdag med nyid yin te //

original: rang bzhin med pa'i chos la ni //
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa'i chos la ni //
translated: In phenomena without inherent nature,

original: rjes su brtag par bya ba yin //
analyzed: rjes su brtag par bya ba yin //
translated: One should engage in subsequent investigation.

original: mngon par @242b brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las //
analyzed: mngon par @242b brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las //

original: gsang ba chen po'i gsang ba a'a li'i mkha' 'gro sgrub pa ste le'u sum cu tham pa'o ////
analyzed: gsang ba chen po'i gsang ba a'a li'i mkha' 'gro sgrub pa ste le'u sum cu tham pa'o ////
translated: The secret of the great secret is the accomplishment of the ḍākinīs of the ḍākinī’s space.

original: de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba //

original: sna tshogs gar gyi dbang phyug mchog /
analyzed: sna tshogs gar gyi dbang phyug mchog /

original: thams cad mchog ste rnal 'byor che //
analyzed: thams cad mchog ste rnal 'byor che //
translated: the supreme of all, the great yoga,

original: dngos grub chen po legs stsol ba //🔽bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: dngos grub chen po legs stsol ba // bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: the bestower of the great powers,🔽one should meditate and meditate well

original: sgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya //
analyzed: sgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya //
translated: with the yoga of the creation stage.

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
translated: In the center of a sun maṇḍala,

original: sim aom dvam las rdo rje 'byung //
analyzed: sim aom dvam las rdo rje 'byung //

original: de nyid yongs gyur bdag nyid de //
analyzed: de nyid yongs gyur bdag nyid de //

analyzed: gsal byed mkha' 'gro mchog gyur pa //

original: sna tshogs dbang phyug sna tshogs mdog /
analyzed: sna tshogs dbang phyug sna tshogs mdog /

original: thams cad rigs kyi mchog dam pa //
analyzed: thams cad rigs kyi mchog dam pa //

original: zhal drug pa la phyag bcu gnyis //
analyzed: zhal drug pa la phyag bcu gnyis //

original: spyan gsum pa la g-yo ba'i sgra //
analyzed: spyan gsum pa la g-yo ba'i sgra //

original: zla ba phyed pa zhi ba 'dzin //
analyzed: zla ba phyed pa zhi ba 'dzin //

original: thod pa'i phreng bas spud pa ste //
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng bas spud pa ste //

analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje dbu la 'chang //

original: spyi gtsug ral pa 'chang ba ste //
analyzed: spyi gtsug ral pa 'chang ba ste //

analyzed: phyag rgya drug gis sku la mtshan //

original: lha yi rgyan gyis sdud pa ste //
analyzed: lha yi rgyan gyis sdud pa ste //

analyzed: skal ngan mu stegs can rnams ni //

analyzed: zhabs kyi padma'i 'og tu mnan //

original: lta pa lnga yi rim pa dag /
analyzed: lta pa lnga yi rim pa dag /

analyzed: g-yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis mnan //

analyzed: skyil krung phyed pa'i gar zhabs can //

analyzed: zhal drug gis ni rnam par brgyan // khyab 'jug gi ni pags pa mnabs //

analyzed: mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan pa ste //

original: rdo rje lha mos rnam par 'khyud //
analyzed: rdo rje lha mos rnam par 'khyud //

original: gcer bu 'og pag ska @243a *//
analyzed: gcer bu 'og pag ska @243a *//

original: rags can // skra grol ba la spyan gsum can //
analyzed: rags can // skra grol ba la spyan gsum can //

analyzed: mchu dang mchu ni rnam 'tshir zhing //

original: rdo rje dril bu mnyam par 'khril //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu mnyam par 'khril //

original: byang chub yan lag gnas 'tshir zhing //
analyzed: byang chub yan lag gnas 'tshir zhing //

analyzed: byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khril //

analyzed: thugs rje chags pa'i ro yis bde //

original: tshangs pa'i pags pa yan lag ni //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i pags pa yan lag ni //

analyzed: phyag gnyis dag gis brkyang nas 'dzin //

analyzed: thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'chang //

analyzed: dbang phyug chen po'i mgo bo thogs //

analyzed: mdud rtse gsum dang ral gri dang // cang te'u zhags pa lcags kyu bsnams //

analyzed: dkar dang sngo dang ljang ba nyid //

original: ser dang dud ka dur smrig ste //
analyzed: ser dang dud ka dur smrig ste //

analyzed: g-yon dang g-yas pa'i ngos dag tu //

analyzed: pi la dang ni nye bi la //

analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ni gnyis po sbyar //

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni //

analyzed: yi ge dvam las yang dag 'byung //

analyzed: g-yon gyi phyogs su dgod par bya //

analyzed: yi ge si las nges byung ba //

analyzed: spyan gsum drag po 'jigs pa ste //

analyzed: 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag /

analyzed: thod pa'i phreng ba'i sku rags can //
translated: a garland of skulls as a belt,

original: thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
translated: adorned with a garland of skulls,

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //

analyzed: 'khyud pa yi ni mchog dam pa //

analyzed: thod pa dang ni gri gug mchog /

analyzed: 'khor lo gsum gyi thabs kyang sgom //

analyzed: aom gyi ye shes mkha' 'gro ni //

original: sku gsung thugs kyi mkha' 'gro ni //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi mkha' 'gro ni //

analyzed: rang gi snying gar de dag bsgom //

original: de ru bsam zhing rnam bsgoms te //
analyzed: de ru bsam zhing rnam bsgoms te //

analyzed: bsgoms la gsang sngags bzlas par bya //

analyzed: aom shr'i pra na bad'a ka a'a a'a aom h'um d'a ki n'i dz'a la sam ba ram aa sv'ah'a /

analyzed: aom hr'im dharma autta me ma h'a badzra d'a ki n'i ye dvam @244a *//

original: h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: h'um phat sv'ah'a /

analyzed: aom sim s'a ga ra autta me ma h'a badzra d'a ki n'i ye sim hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /

original: gsang gsum ye shes bzlas nas ni //
analyzed: gsang gsum ye shes bzlas nas ni //

original: dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma bzla bya //
analyzed: dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma bzla bya //

analyzed: gsal byed rang ming h'um gnyis dang // mthar ni phat dang sbyar bar bya //

original: gsang gsum 'khor lo bsgoms nas ni //
analyzed: gsang gsum 'khor lo bsgoms nas ni //

original: gsum po bsdu zhing bsgoms nas su //
analyzed: gsum po bsdu zhing bsgoms nas su //

original: dam tshig gsang gsum sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: dam tshig gsang gsum sbyor ba yis //

original: bha ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya //
analyzed: bha ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya //
translated: one should meditate in the center of the bhaga.

original: byang chub zla ba dri ma med //
analyzed: byang chub zla ba dri ma med //

original: thugs kyi 'khor lo n'a da gsum //
analyzed: thugs kyi 'khor lo n'a da gsum //

original: gtso bo dag ni gsum yin te; ;mkha' 'gro ma gsum gsum mkha' 'gro //
analyzed: gtso bo dag ni gsum yin te; ;mkha' 'gro ma gsum gsum mkha' 'gro //
translated: the three ḍākinīs are ḍākinīs.

original: sdud cing skyed par mdzad pa ste //
analyzed: sdud cing skyed par mdzad pa ste //
translated: They are the ones who gather and generate.

original: bha gar rdo rje phag mo ni //
analyzed: bha gar rdo rje phag mo ni //

original: gsang ba gsum du rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: gsang ba gsum du rnam par bsgom //

original: de nyid sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: de nyid sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis //

original: de na nga rgyal rnams spangs nas //
analyzed: de na nga rgyal rnams spangs nas //
translated: having abandoned pride there,

original: dus bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: dus bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis //

original: de bzhin bsgom dang bzlas pa bya //
analyzed: de bzhin bsgom dang bzlas pa bya //

original: rtag tu dam tshig bskyang bya zhing //
analyzed: rtag tu dam tshig bskyang bya zhing //

original: 'o ma sna tshogs pas byung ba //
analyzed: 'o ma sna tshogs pas byung ba //

original: bram ze tsha dang sbrang rtsi mar //🔽ma h'a m'am sa mnyam ldan pa //🔽de nyid gsum gyis mngon bsngags te //
analyzed: bram ze tsha dang sbrang rtsi mar // ma h'a m'am sa mnyam ldan pa // de nyid gsum gyis mngon bsngags te //

original: bza' ba dag ni bza' bar bya //
analyzed: bza' ba dag ni bza' bar bya //
translated: One should eat food consecrated with the three syllables.

original: 'du 'dzi med cing sred pa med //
analyzed: 'du 'dzi med cing sred pa med //

original: yongs su bzung ba'i 'khor yang med //
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba'i 'khor yang med //

original: longs spyod min pas longs spyod la //
analyzed: longs spyod min pas longs spyod la //

original: 'chi ba med pa'i zas bza' zhing //
analyzed: 'chi ba med pa'i zas bza' zhing //

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang @244b bsten; ;longs spyod med pa'i zas bza' zhing //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang @244b bsten; ;longs spyod med pa'i zas bza' zhing //

original: rnal 'byor sgom pa'i skom yang btung //
analyzed: rnal 'byor sgom pa'i skom yang btung //

original: gzhan du gang yang btung ba min //
analyzed: gzhan du gang yang btung ba min //

original: nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas //
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas //

original: rang nyid byin gyis brlabs byas nas //
analyzed: rang nyid byin gyis brlabs byas nas //

original: bcom ldan mkha' 'gro pi la ba //🔽rnal 'byor ma ni nye pi la //
analyzed: bcom ldan mkha' 'gro pi la ba // rnal 'byor ma ni nye pi la //

original: thabs ni pi la bar shes bya //
analyzed: thabs ni pi la bar shes bya //

original: shes rab nye ba'i pi lang //
analyzed: shes rab nye ba'i pi lang //

original: grong khyer mthar ni pi la nyid; ;grong gi mtha' ni nye pi la //
analyzed: grong khyer mthar ni pi la nyid; ;grong gi mtha' ni nye pi la //
translated: And the inner pīlava is the outskirts of the city.

original: zla ba nyi ma mnyam sbyor ba //
analyzed: zla ba nyi ma mnyam sbyor ba //

original: pi la dang ni nye bi yin //
analyzed: pi la dang ni nye bi yin //

original: skad cig sbyor ba pi la ba //
analyzed: skad cig sbyor ba pi la ba //

original: dga' ba nye ba'i pi la ste //
analyzed: dga' ba nye ba'i pi la ste //

analyzed: mthu stobs du ma ldan par ni; ;skye ba 'di la 'grub pa yin //

original: pa shu thams cad bza' bya zhing //
analyzed: pa shu thams cad bza' bya zhing //

original: lha bshos dag kyang de bzhin bsgrub //
analyzed: lha bshos dag kyang de bzhin bsgrub //

original: dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma 'dus nas //
analyzed: dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma 'dus nas //

original: dus la mthun pa 'dus byas nas //
analyzed: dus la mthun pa 'dus byas nas //

original: sgo ru lha mo bzhi bkod la //
analyzed: sgo ru lha mo bzhi bkod la //

original: mkha' 'gro ma ni dngos grub ste //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ni dngos grub ste //

original: phyi rol dkyil 'khor lha mo bri //
analyzed: phyi rol dkyil 'khor lha mo bri //

original: snam bu'i mtshams bzhi de ru ni //
analyzed: snam bu'i mtshams bzhi de ru ni //

original: lha mo nyi shu dgod bya zhing //
analyzed: lha mo nyi shu dgod bya zhing //

original: mkha' 'gro ma sogs mtshams rnams su //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma sogs mtshams rnams su //

analyzed: zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //

original: phyi rol dkyil 'khor dag tu brtag /
analyzed: phyi rol dkyil 'khor dag tu brtag /

analyzed: sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi; ;'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad du //

original: rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyun //
analyzed: rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyun //

analyzed: zur bzhi cha ni thams cad dang // sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su //

analyzed: rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan cing // phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo //

original: de yi nang du re'u mig dgu //
analyzed: de yi nang du re'u mig dgu //

original: sgo rnams kyang ni bya ba ste //
analyzed: sgo rnams kyang ni bya ba ste //

analyzed: 'di ltar mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma //

original: dra @247b ba'i sdom pa stong pa ste //
analyzed: dra @247b ba'i sdom pa stong pa ste //

original: byang chub phyogs ni sum cu bdun //
analyzed: byang chub phyogs ni sum cu bdun //

analyzed: chos kyi rnam par dag pa yin //

original: dbus su sa ni bcu gsum ste //
analyzed: dbus su sa ni bcu gsum ste //

analyzed: phyi rol gnas dang nye ba'i gnas  khrod dang ni nye dur khrod //

original: 'di ltar sbyor bas rnam dag par //
analyzed: 'di ltar sbyor bas rnam dag par //
translated: In this way, the purity of the union

original: sdom pa mchog ni bsgom par bya //
analyzed: sdom pa mchog ni bsgom par bya //

original: de ni thugs kyi ye shes te //
analyzed: de ni thugs kyi ye shes te //

original: ye shes mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma'o //
analyzed: ye shes mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma'o //

analyzed: phung po khams dang skye mched la //

analyzed: cho ga gnyis po sbyar bar bya //

original: ye shes mchog gi sgom pa ste //
analyzed: ye shes mchog gi sgom pa ste //

original: gsang ba gsum gyi 'khor lo dgod //
analyzed: gsang ba gsum gyi 'khor lo dgod //

original: phyed dang phyed du rnam par dgod //
analyzed: phyed dang phyed du rnam par dgod //

original: mkha' 'gro gsum ni 'khor lo'i dbus //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro gsum ni 'khor lo'i dbus //

analyzed: dam tshig rnal 'byor 'byung ba che //

original: ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas ni //
analyzed: ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas ni //

original: zhabs bsil byas nas gzhug par bya //
analyzed: zhabs bsil byas nas gzhug par bya //

original: ye shes chu yis dbang bskur nas //
analyzed: ye shes chu yis dbang bskur nas //

original: gtso bo dag ni rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: gtso bo dag ni rnam par bsgom //
translated: One should meditate on the principal ones.

original: bdag med chos kyi ro kun gyis //
analyzed: bdag med chos kyi ro kun gyis //

original: dam tshig mchog ni dri ma med //
analyzed: dam tshig mchog ni dri ma med //

original: ba spu khung bu thams cad las //
analyzed: ba spu khung bu thams cad las //

original: dam tshig gsang ba gsum spros nas //
analyzed: dam tshig gsang ba gsum spros nas //

original: sems can ma lus dam tshig gi /
analyzed: sems can ma lus dam tshig gi /

original: mkha' 'gro ru ni rab gnas bya //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ru ni rab gnas bya //

original: 'bad pa yis ni bsdus nas kyang //
analyzed: 'bad pa yis ni bsdus nas kyang //

original: gsang ba gsum du gzhug par bya //
analyzed: gsang ba gsum du gzhug par bya //

original: sngon grub pa yi mkha' 'gro ni //
analyzed: sngon grub pa yi mkha' 'gro ni //

original: byin rlabs gnas su dgod par bya //
analyzed: byin rlabs gnas su dgod par bya //

original: 'di ni rdo rje theg chen te //
analyzed: 'di ni rdo rje theg chen te //

original: mkha' 'gro spyod pa'i gnas la bzhugs //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro spyod pa'i gnas la bzhugs //

original: sdom pa mchog ni bzlas @248a *//
analyzed: sdom pa mchog ni bzlas @248a *//

original: pa yis; ;bla na med pa'i go 'phang ster //
analyzed: pa yis; ;bla na med pa'i go 'phang ster //

original: dus bzhi dag tu ci 'dod par //
analyzed: dus bzhi dag tu ci 'dod par //
translated: In the four periods, whatever is desired,

original: skyo ba med par rtag tu sgom //
analyzed: skyo ba med par rtag tu sgom //

original: lugs su 'byung dang ldog pa yis; ;'khor lo mchog ni rnam par spro //
analyzed: lugs su 'byung dang ldog pa yis; ;'khor lo mchog ni rnam par spro //

original: ba spu'i khung bu las mdun du //
analyzed: ba spu'i khung bu las mdun du //

original: bde mchog spros nas mchod par bya //
analyzed: bde mchog spros nas mchod par bya //

original: rdo rje gsum ni dbang bskur nas //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum ni dbang bskur nas //
translated: Having conferred empowerment with the three vajras,

original: 'gog pa'i khro bo rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: 'gog pa'i khro bo rnam par bsgom //

original: ye shes khro bo lhan cig tu //
analyzed: ye shes khro bo lhan cig tu //

original: sprin gyi 'brug sgra lta bur bzla //
analyzed: sprin gyi 'brug sgra lta bur bzla //

original: 'gro zhing 'ong ba sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: 'gro zhing 'ong ba sbyor ba yis //

original: mi smra rdo rje brtul zhugs che //
analyzed: mi smra rdo rje brtul zhugs che //
translated: The great vajra conduct of silence,

original: zhag bdun gyis ni nges par yang //
analyzed: zhag bdun gyis ni nges par yang //

original: mthu dang stobs ni 'grub 'gyur te //
analyzed: mthu dang stobs ni 'grub 'gyur te //
translated: attain power and strength.🔽One will be able to cause trembling and falling,

original: g-yo zhing ldeg par byed pa dang // 'khrug cing g-yengs dang gzhug pa dang // nad med pa ni nad yod byed //
analyzed: g-yo zhing ldeg par byed pa dang // 'khrug cing g-yengs dang gzhug pa dang // nad med pa ni nad yod byed //

original: nad yod pa ni nad med byed //
analyzed: nad yod pa ni nad med byed //
translated: illness in the healthy and health in the sick.

original: de ltar sgom pa byas nas ni //
analyzed: de ltar sgom pa byas nas ni //

original: las 'dir the tshom med pa yin //
analyzed: las 'dir the tshom med pa yin //

original: nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas //
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas //

original: bsgom dang bzlas la dga' ba dang // dam tshig zas la dga' ba ni //
analyzed: bsgom dang bzlas la dga' ba dang // dam tshig zas la dga' ba ni //

original: thogs pa med par tshe yang brtan //
analyzed: thogs pa med par tshe yang brtan //

original: 'di ltar rang gi cho gas bzlas //
analyzed: 'di ltar rang gi cho gas bzlas //

original: sangs rgyas gnas su legs par 'jug /
analyzed: sangs rgyas gnas su legs par 'jug /
translated: and one will enter well into the abode of the buddhas.

original: der ni dam tshig 'khor lo ni; ;mkhas pas sgom mchod bzlas pa bya //
analyzed: der ni dam tshig 'khor lo ni; ;mkhas pas sgom mchod bzlas pa bya //
translated: There, the wise one should meditate on and worship the wheel of commitments, and recite.

original: gsang sngags 'di dag bshad bar bya //
analyzed: gsang sngags 'di dag bshad bar bya //
translated: I will now explain these mantras:🔽Oṃ śrī vajra ḍākinī āḥ

original: aom shr'i badzra d'a ki n'i a'a: dhi h'um d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ram hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i badzra d'a ki n'i a'a: dhi h'um d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ram hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: dhi hūṃ ḍākinī jvalā śamvaraṃ huṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom shr'i buddha d'a @248b k'i n'i a'a bhrum h'um d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ra hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom shr'i karm'a d'a ki aa kham h'um d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ra hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i buddha d'a @248b k'i n'i a'a bhrum h'um d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ra hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom shr'i karm'a d'a ki aa kham h'um d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ra hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ śrī buddhaḍākinī āḥ bhrūṃ hūṃ dākinī jālāścavara hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ śrī karmaḍākinī a khaṃ hūṃ dākinī jālāścavara hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom shr'i padma d'a ka aa hr'i h'um d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ra hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom shr'i padma d'a ka aa hr'i h'um d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ra hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ śrī padmaḍākinī a hrīḥ hūṃ dākinī jālāścavara hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom shr'i ratna d'a ka aam h'um d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ra hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i ratna d'a ka aam h'um d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ra hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ śrī ratnaḍākinī aṃ hūṃ dākinī jālāścavara hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Those four ḍākinīs,

original: mkha' 'gro bzhi po de dag dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang l'a ma dang // dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro bzhi po de dag dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang l'a ma dang // dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma //
translated: ḍākinī, Lāmā, Khaṇḍarohā, and Rūpiṇī,

original: mgrin pa mnyam par bsnol ba ste //
analyzed: mgrin pa mnyam par bsnol ba ste //
translated: are entwined around his neck.

original: byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril //🔽de yi mdog dang phyag dang zhal //
analyzed: byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril // de yi mdog dang phyag dang zhal //
translated: He embraces them with his two thighs.🔽One should visualize their colors, hands, faces,

original: phyag mtshan rnams kyang rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: phyag mtshan rnams kyang rnam par bsgom //
translated: and hand implements.🔽Having manifested the goddesses,

original: lha mo mngon du byas nas ni; ;snying po'i gsang sngags so so yin //
analyzed: lha mo mngon du byas nas ni; ;snying po'i gsang sngags so so yin //
translated: each with their essence mantra,

original: aom shr'i badzra b'a r'a hi bam hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i badzra b'a r'a hi bam hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ śrī vajra-vārāhī vaṃ huṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom shr'i d'a ki n'i d'am hum h'um phat sv'aha'/
analyzed: aom shr'i d'a ki n'i d'am hum h'um phat sv'aha'/

original: aom shr'i l'a me l'am hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i l'a me l'am hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ śrī lāmā lāṃ huṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom shr'i khanda ro he khm hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i khanda ro he khm hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ śrī khaṇḍarohī khaṃ huṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom shr'i r'u pa ni r'um hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i r'u pa ni r'um hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /

original: 'di ni lnga po'i bdag nyid kyi'o //
analyzed: 'di ni lnga po'i bdag nyid kyi'o //

analyzed: mtshams kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags ni /

analyzed: aom shr'i buddha d'a ki n'i hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom shr'i karm'a d'a ki n'i hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /

original: aom shr'i padma d'a ki n'i hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i padma d'a ki n'i hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ śrī padma-ḍākinī hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom shr'i ratna hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i ratna hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /

original: sgo ru mkha' gro ma yi sngags //
analyzed: sgo ru mkha' gro ma yi sngags //

analyzed: bzhi po sna tshogs mdog can te //

analyzed: ji bzhin rigs kyis kun la khyab //

analyzed: aom su r'u pe hum h'um phat/ aom badzra dunti hum h'um phat/

analyzed: shar phyogs kyi ni @249a *//

original: snam bu la //
analyzed: snam bu la //

analyzed: aom badzra sa yi ki h'um h'um phat/ aom gandha ri hum h'um phat/

analyzed: byad gi snam bu la lha mo bzhi sku mdog ljang gu ste /

analyzed: ao tsanda sham kha re hum h'um phat/ aom bhri ku ta hum h'um phat/

original: aom bi shva r'u pe hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom bi shva r'u pe hum h'um phat/

original: aom badzra kaddha ni hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom badzra kaddha ni hum h'um phat/

analyzed: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams bzhi ru lha mo bzhi po gzugs gnyis pa'i mdog can te /

original: de'i sngags bshad pa /🔽aom shr'i badzra kha le hum h'um phat/
analyzed: de'i sngags bshad pa / aom shr'i badzra kha le hum h'um phat/

analyzed: aom badzra ma le hum h'um phat/ aom badzra ya sha: ka ri hum h'um phat/

original: aom badzra n'a l'a ra ke hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom badzra n'a l'a ra ke hum h'um phat/

analyzed: sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi po sna tshogs pa'i mdog can drag po'i gzugs ldan @249b pa ste; de'i sngags su bshad pa /

analyzed: shar du aom shri badzra pam ge le dza: dza: hum h'um phat/ lho ru aom shr'i badzra dzva li ni h'um hum h'um phat/

original: nub tu aom shr'i badzra kunda li pam bam hum h'um phat/
analyzed: nub tu aom shr'i badzra kunda li pam bam hum h'um phat/

original: byang du aom shr'i badzra phee ra bi ho hum h'um phat/
analyzed: byang du aom shr'i badzra phee ra bi ho hum h'um phat/
translated: In the north, Oṃ śrī vajra phairvi ho hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

analyzed: thams cad gsal byed mtha' ru ni //
