translated: With the bliss of methods for taming,

original: yul la yongs su spyod pa na //
analyzed: yul la yongs su spyod pa na //
translated: When enjoying objects,

original: bla med ye shes 'bras bu 'thob //
analyzed: bla med ye shes 'bras bu 'thob //
translated: The result of unsurpassed wisdom is attained.

original: sems can thams cad 'di yis bde //
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'di yis bde //
translated: All sentient beings are happy through this.

original: 'chi med bde ba'i longs spyod kyis //
analyzed: 'chi med bde ba'i longs spyod kyis //
translated: With the enjoyment of deathless bliss,

original: ye shes 'bras bu rnyed pa yin //🔽'di ni sems can thams cad kyi //
analyzed: ye shes 'bras bu rnyed pa yin // 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi //
translated: The result of wisdom is attained.🔽This is the attainment

original: mchog gi go 'phang thob pa'o //
analyzed: mchog gi go 'phang thob pa'o //
translated: Of the supreme state of all sentient beings.

original: mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
analyzed: mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
translated: From the Tantra of the Supreme Secret of the Supreme Tantra

original: sbyangs pa'i yon tan bskyed pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o ////
analyzed: sbyangs pa'i yon tan bskyed pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o ////
translated: The thirty-third chapter on generating the qualities of training.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, moreover, I will explain

original: char dbab cho ga'i rim pa ni //
analyzed: char dbab cho ga'i rim pa ni //
translated: the procedure for the rite of rain.

original: padma 'dab ma brgyad mchog gi //
analyzed: padma 'dab ma brgyad mchog gi //
translated: In the center of a supreme eight-petaled lotus

original: lte ba ge sar bcas pa la //
analyzed: lte ba ge sar bcas pa la //
translated: with a filament and a stamen,

original: de yi dbus su rdo rje che //
analyzed: de yi dbus su rdo rje che //
translated: in the middle of that, the great vajra,

original: mche ba rnam gtsigs 'jigs pa can //
analyzed: mche ba rnam gtsigs 'jigs pa can //
translated: frightening with bared fangs,

original: phyag brgyad pa la zhal bzhi pa //
analyzed: phyag brgyad pa la zhal bzhi pa //
translated: with four faces, eight arms,

original: spyan gsum 'jigs pa'ang rab tu 'jigs //
analyzed: spyan gsum 'jigs pa'ang rab tu 'jigs //
translated: and three eyes, terrifying even the terrifying.

original: rdo rje mtshon ni gsor mdzad cing //🔽sdigs mdzub zhags par ldan pa dang // thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
analyzed: rdo rje mtshon ni gsor mdzad cing // sdigs mdzub zhags par ldan pa dang // thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
translated: Wielding a vajra weapon,🔽with a threatening gesture and a noose,🔽holding a skull cup and a khaṭvāṅga,

original: lcags kyu dang ni mdung bsnams shing //
analyzed: lcags kyu dang ni mdung bsnams shing //
translated: holding a goad and a spear,

original: dpa' bo'i pags pa bsnams shing 'dzin //
analyzed: dpa' bo'i pags pa bsnams shing 'dzin //
translated: holding the hide of a hero,

original: cang te'u dang ni brgyad par bshad //
analyzed: cang te'u dang ni brgyad par bshad //
translated: and a small drum—these are explained as the eight.

original: g-yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni //
analyzed: g-yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni //
translated: With his right leg extended,

original: chu lha 'jigs pa myos pa gnon //
analyzed: chu lha 'jigs pa myos pa gnon //
translated: he tramples on the terrified, intoxicated Varuṇa.

original: zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'ching //
analyzed: zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'ching //
translated: He has a half-moon crest,

original: sna tshogs rdo rjes rnam par brgyan //🔽phyag rgya @252a *//
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rjes rnam par brgyan // phyag rgya @252a *//
translated: adorned with a variegated vajra.

original: drug gis sku la brgyan //
analyzed: drug gis sku la brgyan //
translated: He is adorned with the six mudras on his body.

original: thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
translated: Adorned with a garland of skulls,

original: stag gi pags pa gos su man bas //
analyzed: stag gi pags pa gos su man bas //
translated: Wearing a tiger skin as a garment,

original: thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan mchog /🔽mchus gnon zhal gdong rnam sgyur zhing //
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan mchog / mchus gnon zhal gdong rnam sgyur zhing //
translated: With a crown of the supreme garland of skulls,🔽With a face contorted in a hissing expression,

original: khro bar lta zhing 'jigs par gzigs //
analyzed: khro bar lta zhing 'jigs par gzigs //
translated: Frowning with wrathful eyes,

original: 'dab ma brgyad la klu brgyad bri //
analyzed: 'dab ma brgyad la klu brgyad bri //
translated: One should draw the eight nāgas on the eight petals:🔽Ananta, Vāsuki,

original: mtha' yas dang ni nor rgyas dang // 'jog po padma padma che //🔽dung skyong dang ni stobs kyi rgyu //
analyzed: mtha' yas dang ni nor rgyas dang // 'jog po padma padma che // dung skyong dang ni stobs kyi rgyu //
translated: Takṣaka, Padma, Mahāpadma,🔽Śaṅkhapāla, Kulika,

original: dga' bo dang ni brgyad yin te //
analyzed: dga' bo dang ni brgyad yin te //
translated: And Nandaka as the eighth.

original: dkar dang sngo dang dmar dang ljang //
analyzed: dkar dang sngo dang dmar dang ljang //
translated: White, blue, red, and green,

original: ser dang dud pa'i mdog can te //
analyzed: ser dang dud pa'i mdog can te //
translated: Yellow, and the color of smoke,🔽Green and yellow,

original: ljang gu dang ni ser po ste; ;thal mo sbyar bar byas nas ni //
analyzed: ljang gu dang ni ser po ste; ;thal mo sbyar bar byas nas ni //
translated: With palms joined,

original: bcom ldan 'das la mngon phyogs pa //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la mngon phyogs pa //
translated: Facing the Blessed One,

original: 'jigs pas bka' drin slong bar byed //
analyzed: 'jigs pas bka' drin slong bar byed //
translated: Begging for kindness out of fear,

original: skrag pas lta zhing gnas pa 'o //
analyzed: skrag pas lta zhing gnas pa 'o //
translated: Dwelling with fearful eyes.

original: bcom ldan sku lus sngon po can //
analyzed: bcom ldan sku lus sngon po can //
translated: The Blessed One, with a blue body,

original: 'jigs shing shin tu 'jigs par mdzad //
analyzed: 'jigs shing shin tu 'jigs par mdzad //
translated: Terrifying and extremely terrifying,

original: g-yas pa dud ka dmar po ste //
analyzed: g-yas pa dud ka dmar po ste //
translated: With the right [naga] smoke-colored and red,

original: g-yon pa ljang gu dud ka 'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa ljang gu dud ka 'o //
translated: The left is green, the rear is smoke-colored.

original: steng gi zhal ni mkha' lding gdong //
analyzed: steng gi zhal ni mkha' lding gdong //
translated: The upper face is the face of Garuḍa,

original: zhal rnam sgyur zhing 'jigs pa 'o //
analyzed: zhal rnam sgyur zhing 'jigs pa 'o //
translated: with a terrifying, wrathful expression.

original: nyi ma dmar po'i gzi brjid can //
analyzed: nyi ma dmar po'i gzi brjid can //
translated: It has the brilliance of a red sun,

original: nyi ma bcu gnyis nyi mnyam 'od //
analyzed: nyi ma bcu gnyis nyi mnyam 'od //
translated: with the light of twelve suns.

original: phag mo dag gis mgul 'khyud cing //
analyzed: phag mo dag gis mgul 'khyud cing //
translated: It is embraced by the pure Vārāhī,

original: byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril //
analyzed: byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril //
translated: and is well-embraced by the two thighs.

original: yang na phyag ni bcu gnyis pa //
analyzed: yang na phyag ni bcu gnyis pa //
translated: Or else, it has twelve arms,

original: bde chen mchog ni bcu gnyis pa //
analyzed: bde chen mchog ni bcu gnyis pa //
translated: the supreme great bliss.🔽It holds a flaying knife, a head of Brahmā,

original: gri gug tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang // rdo rje dril bu yang dag ldan //
analyzed: gri gug tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang // rdo rje dril bu yang dag ldan //
translated: a vajra, and a bell,

original: lha mo'i @252b mchu ni rnam par 'tshir //
analyzed: lha mo'i @252b mchu ni rnam par 'tshir //
translated: and bites the goddess’s lip.🔽It is naked, with loose hair,

original: gcer bu dbu skra grol ba dang // spyan gsum pa la sku rags can //
analyzed: gcer bu dbu skra grol ba dang // spyan gsum pa la sku rags can //
translated: three eyes, and a belt.

original: dzambu'i chu bo mchog gi sku //
analyzed: dzambu'i chu bo mchog gi sku //
translated: It has the supreme body of the Jāmbūnada gold.

original: gnyis su med par sbyor bar gnas //
analyzed: gnyis su med par sbyor bar gnas //
translated: It abides in union with the nondual.

original: klu ni rang gi chung mar bcas //
analyzed: klu ni rang gi chung mar bcas //
translated: The nāgas are with their wives,🔽and Varuṇa is with his wife,

original: chu lha'ang chung mar bcas pa dang // chu lha'i lus ni dkar po can //
analyzed: chu lha'ang chung mar bcas pa dang // chu lha'i lus ni dkar po can //
translated: with a white body.

original: bka' drin dag ni slong bar byed //
analyzed: bka' drin dag ni slong bar byed //
translated: They request the kindness.

original: snying gar ye shes 'khor lo dag /
analyzed: snying gar ye shes 'khor lo dag /
translated: In the heart, the wheel of pristine consciousness,

original: de mdog phyag dang zhal yang skyed //
analyzed: de mdog phyag dang zhal yang skyed //
translated: The same color, with faces and arms, is generated.

original: de yi snying ga h'um n'am h'um dgod cing //
analyzed: de yi snying ga h'um n'am h'um dgod cing //
translated: In its heart, the syllable hūṃ or hūṃ is placed,

original: lus ngag yid kyang de bzhin te //
analyzed: lus ngag yid kyang de bzhin te //
translated: And likewise, the body, speech, and mind.

original: klu yi rang snying de nyid la //
analyzed: klu yi rang snying de nyid la //
translated: In the very heart of the nāgas,

original: h'um n'am h'um ni rnam par dgod //
analyzed: h'um n'am h'um ni rnam par dgod //
translated: The syllable hūṃ or hūṃ is placed.

original: gsang sngags rgyal po'i cho ga ni //
analyzed: gsang sngags rgyal po'i cho ga ni //
translated: The ritual of the king of mantras

original: khro bo'i tshig ltar bzlas brjod bya //
analyzed: khro bo'i tshig ltar bzlas brjod bya //
translated: Is recited with wrathful words.

original: chu bo'i 'gram mam rgya mtsho 'am /🔽khron pa'am klu yi mtsho dang ni //
analyzed: chu bo'i 'gram mam rgya mtsho 'am / khron pa'am klu yi mtsho dang ni //
translated: On the bank of a river or in the ocean,🔽In a well or a lake of nāgas,

original: rdzing bu lteng ka rnams su ni //
analyzed: rdzing bu lteng ka rnams su ni //
translated: In ponds and pools,🔽The wise one performs the recitation of the wrathful one.

original: blo can khro bo'i bzlas pa bya; ;yang na klu yi gnas su ni //
analyzed: blo can khro bo'i bzlas pa bya; ;yang na klu yi gnas su ni //
translated: Or, in the abode of the nāgas,

original: sgom pa bzlas pa dag la 'jug /
analyzed: sgom pa bzlas pa dag la 'jug /
translated: One engages in the recitation of meditation.

original: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam h'um n'am n'a ga bar sh'a pa ya h'um d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ra h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam h'um n'am n'a ga bar sh'a pa ya h'um d'a ki n'i dz'a la sham ba ra h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ śrī vajra he he ru ru kā hūṃ nāga varṣāya hūṃ dākinī jvalā śambara hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: 'di dag bsgom te khri tsam bzla //
analyzed: 'di dag bsgom te khri tsam bzla //
translated: Having meditated on these, recite ten thousand times.

original: dus bzhi dag tu stong du 'o //
analyzed: dus bzhi dag tu stong du 'o //
translated: In the four periods, recite one thousand times.

original: zhag bdun gyis ni nges par yang //
analyzed: zhag bdun gyis ni nges par yang //
translated: In seven days, it will certainly

original: sa rnams kun tu char 'bab 'gyur //
analyzed: sa rnams kun tu char 'bab 'gyur //
translated: Rain will fall everywhere.

original: dam tshig sbyin sreg mchod dus su //
analyzed: dam tshig sbyin sreg mchod dus su //
translated: At the time of the pledge, fire offering, and worship,

original: glu dang gar ni nyer ldan pas //
analyzed: glu dang gar ni nyer ldan pas //
translated: Endowed with song and dance,

original: 'o ma dag ni bza' zhing btung //
analyzed: 'o ma dag ni bza' zhing btung //
translated: One should eat and drink milk.

original: rnal 'byor pas ni klu brgyad bzla //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas ni klu brgyad bzla //
translated: The yogī should recite the eight nāgas.

original: 'o ma'i khrus kyi cho ga yis //
analyzed: 'o ma'i khrus kyi cho ga yis //
translated: With the rite of bathing in milk,

original: 'o mas sbyin sreg bsreg blugs bya //🔽'o ma'i shing @253a *//🔽gi bud shing bya //
analyzed: 'o mas sbyin sreg bsreg blugs bya // 'o ma'i shing @253a *// gi bud shing bya //
translated: One should perform the fire offering of milk.🔽The firewood should be of milk trees.🔽The kindling should be of milk trees,

original: 'o ma'i shing gi yam shing dang // 'o mar bcas pas sbyin sreg bya //
analyzed: 'o ma'i shing gi yam shing dang // 'o mar bcas pas sbyin sreg bya //
translated: And one should perform the fire offering with milk.

original: bum pa 'o mas yongs su dgang //
analyzed: bum pa 'o mas yongs su dgang //
translated: The vase should be filled with milk.

original: me sogs mtshams dang phyogs rnams su //
analyzed: me sogs mtshams dang phyogs rnams su //
translated: In the intermediate and cardinal directions, beginning with the fire,

original: 'o mar bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin //
analyzed: 'o mar bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin //
translated: One should offer the milk oblation.

original: aom aam aa nanta ya h'um n'am h'um sv'ah'a /🔽aom bam b'a su ke h'um n'am h'um sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom aam aa nanta ya h'um n'am h'um sv'ah'a / aom bam b'a su ke h'um n'am h'um sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ aṃ anantaya hūṃ nāṃ hūṃ svāhā.🔽Oṃ vaṃ vāsukī hūṃ nāṃ hūṃ svāhā.

original: aom tam taksha ka h'um n'am h'um sv'ah'a /🔽aom pam padma h'um n'am h'um sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom tam taksha ka h'um n'am h'um sv'ah'a / aom pam padma h'um n'am h'um sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ taṃ takṣaka hūṃ nāṃ hūṃ svāhā.🔽Oṃ paṃ padma hūṃ nāṃ hūṃ svāhā.

original: aom mam mah'a padma h'um n'am h'um sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom mam mah'a padma h'um n'am h'um sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ maṃ mahāpadma hūṃ nāṃ hūṃ svāhā.

original: aom sham sham kha p'a la h'um n'am h'um sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom sham sham kha p'a la h'um n'am h'um sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ śaṃ śaṃ khaparā huṃ nāṃ huṃ svāhā.

original: aom kam karko ta h'um n'am h'um sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom kam karko ta h'um n'am h'um sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ kaṃ karkoṭa huṃ nāṃ huṃ svāhā.

original: aom aam aa nanta tapta h'um n'am h'um sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom aam aa nanta tapta h'um n'am h'um sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ aṃ ananta taṃpā huṃ nāṃ huṃ svāhā.

original: aom h'um bam ba ru na ya n'a g'a dhi pa te ye n'a gam barsh'a pa ya h'um n'am h'um sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom h'um bam ba ru na ya n'a g'a dhi pa te ye n'a gam barsh'a pa ya h'um n'am h'um sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ hūṃ vaṃ to the lord of nāgas, to Varuṇa, to the nāgas, make it rain, huṃ nāṃ huṃ svāhā.

original: 'di bzlas khro bo dang bcas pas //
analyzed: 'di bzlas khro bo dang bcas pas //
translated: Reciting this together with the wrathful one,

original: kun gyi bzlas pa khri tsam bya //
analyzed: kun gyi bzlas pa khri tsam bya //
translated: one should recite all of them ten thousand times.

original: 'o ma 'bras snying zas su bza'//
analyzed: 'o ma 'bras snying zas su bza'//
translated: One should eat a diet of milk, rice, and meat.

original: dbang po thul cing yod mi smra; ;bri gzugs spangs pa'i mngon sum du //🔽khri tsam bzlas na mngon du 'gyur //
analyzed: dbang po thul cing yod mi smra; ;bri gzugs spangs pa'i mngon sum du // khri tsam bzlas na mngon du 'gyur //
translated: Subduing the senses, one should remain silent.🔽If one recites ten thousand times in front of a painting,

original: mngon sum du ni dngos grub cing //
analyzed: mngon sum du ni dngos grub cing //
translated: one will be successful.🔽One will be successful in front of the painting,

original: smras pa tsam gyis char 'bebs te //
analyzed: smras pa tsam gyis char 'bebs te //
translated: and it will rain merely by speaking.

original: 'di la the tshom ma byed cig /🔽dngul gyi snod kyi nang du ni //
analyzed: 'di la the tshom ma byed cig / dngul gyi snod kyi nang du ni //
translated: One should not doubt this.🔽In a silver vessel,

original: yungs kar dang ni chu blugs la //
analyzed: yungs kar dang ni chu blugs la //
translated: one should pour mustard seeds and water.

original: de la nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du yongs su bzlas te sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs la dri chu dang 'om bsres pas khrus byas te chu 'gram gyis sbrus pa las klu'i gzugs byas la nub tu mgo bstan te mgo bo dgu la chus dbang bskur te
analyzed: de la nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du yongs su bzlas te sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs la dri chu dang 'om bsres pas khrus byas te chu 'gram gyis sbrus pa las klu'i gzugs byas la nub tu mgo bstan te mgo bo dgu la chus dbang bskur te
translated: Having recited it twenty-one times, one should bathe the image of the Buddha with a mixture of water and milk, and having made a nāga image out of clay from the bank of a river, with its head facing west, one should consecrate the nine heads with water.

original: // de nas chu bo'i @253b nang du bzhug go //
analyzed: // de nas chu bo'i @253b nang du bzhug go //
translated: Then one should place it in the river.

original: de ma thag tu lhas char 'bebs shing /
analyzed: de ma thag tu lhas char 'bebs shing /
translated: Immediately the gods will send rain,

original: dzambu'i gling du char 'bebs 'gyur //
analyzed: dzambu'i gling du char 'bebs 'gyur //
translated: and it will rain in Jambudvīpa.

original: sa rnams 'bru yis gang 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: sa rnams 'bru yis gang 'gyur zhing //
translated: The earth will be filled with grain,

original: nags tshal rnams ni 'phel bar byed //
analyzed: nags tshal rnams ni 'phel bar byed //
translated: and the forests will flourish.

original: sems can thams cad bde reg nas //
analyzed: sems can thams cad bde reg nas //
translated: All beings will be happy,

original: phan tshun khro bo'i gzugs can ni //🔽bdag bsgoms rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas //
analyzed: phan tshun khro bo'i gzugs can ni // bdag bsgoms rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas //
translated: and they will be mutually hostile.🔽Having meditated on oneself in accordance with the tantra,

original: rang gti snyin ga kho nar ni //
analyzed: rang gti snyin ga kho nar ni //
translated: one should visualize🔽Heruka Vajra

original: he ru rdo rje bsgoms pa yi //
analyzed: he ru rdo rje bsgoms pa yi //
translated: in one's own heart.

original: char pa yang ni 'bab par 'gyur //
analyzed: char pa yang ni 'bab par 'gyur //
translated: Rain will also fall.

original: ri'i steng du 'dzegs te rtse gsum pa la yongs su bzlas na ser ba gcod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ri'i steng du 'dzegs te rtse gsum pa la yongs su bzlas na ser ba gcod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Ascending a mountain, if one recites over a trident, hail will be stopped.

original: cang te'u la yongs su bzlas na me mched pa'i me rengs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: cang te'u la yongs su bzlas na me mched pa'i me rengs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Reciting over a ḍamaru, a spreading fire will be stopped.

original: zhags pa la yongs su bzlas na 'gugs par byed /🔽thod pa la yongs su bzlas na khrag 'gugs par byed do //
analyzed: zhags pa la yongs su bzlas na 'gugs par byed / thod pa la yongs su bzlas na khrag 'gugs par byed do //
translated: Reciting over a noose, one will summon.🔽Reciting over a skull, one will summon blood.

original: dgra sta la yongs su bzlas na gsod par byed do //
analyzed: dgra sta la yongs su bzlas na gsod par byed do //
translated: Reciting over an axe, one will kill.

original: kha tv'am ga la yongs su bzlas na zhi bar byed do //
analyzed: kha tv'am ga la yongs su bzlas na zhi bar byed do //
translated: Reciting over a khaṭvāṅga, one will pacify.

original: gri gug la yongs su bzlas na 'jig rten gsum du rgyu ba gsod par byed do //
analyzed: gri gug la yongs su bzlas na 'jig rten gsum du rgyu ba gsod par byed do //
translated: Reciting over a flaying knife, one will kill those who move in the three worlds.

original: mgo bo la yongs su bzlas na 'chi ba slong bar byed do //
analyzed: mgo bo la yongs su bzlas na 'chi ba slong bar byed do //
translated: Reciting over a head, one will revive the dead.

original: rdo rje gsor zhing yongs su bzlas na sa 'og gi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje gsor zhing yongs su bzlas na sa 'og gi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
translated: Waving a vajra and reciting, one will obtain the power of invisibility.

original: dril bu la yongs su bzlas na mi dga' ba yongs su 'gugs par byed do //
analyzed: dril bu la yongs su bzlas na mi dga' ba yongs su 'gugs par byed do //
translated: Reciting over a bell, one will summon the disaffected.

original: glang po che'i pags pa la yongs su bzlas te bting na bar snang la 'phur bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: glang po che'i pags pa la yongs su bzlas te bting na bar snang la 'phur bar 'gyur te /
translated: Having enchanted the skin of an elephant, if one spreads it out, one will fly up into the sky.

original: dpag tshad stong phrag brgyar 'gro zhing slar ldog go /🔽phyag rgya drug la @254a *//
analyzed: dpag tshad stong phrag brgyar 'gro zhing slar ldog go / phyag rgya drug la @254a *//
translated: One will go a hundred thousand leagues and return.

original: yongs su bzlas na pha rol gyi mdun du mi snang bar 'gyur ro //🔽sa steng du ni kun spyod cing //
analyzed: yongs su bzlas na pha rol gyi mdun du mi snang bar 'gyur ro // sa steng du ni kun spyod cing //
translated: Having enchanted the six seals, one will disappear in front of the enemy.🔽One will move about on the surface of the earth

original: ci bde bar ni gnas par 'gyur //🔽mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bal ma'i bla ma las /
analyzed: ci bde bar ni gnas par 'gyur // mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bal ma'i bla ma las /
translated: and dwell as one pleases.🔽This concludes the thirty-fourth chapter of the Root Tantra of the Glorious and Golden Cakrasaṃvara called “The Tantra of the Questions of Subāhu,” which is part of the transmitted teachings of the glorious Vajrayāna.

original: char dbab pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi'o ////
analyzed: char dbab pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi'o ////
translated: The Chapter on the Ritual of Rain

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, I will explain

original: gsang ba mchog ni mdor pa sdus nas //
analyzed: gsang ba mchog ni mdor pa sdus nas //
translated: the supreme secret, having condensed it,

original: skad cig gis ni bdag sgom pa //
analyzed: skad cig gis ni bdag sgom pa //
translated: in an instant, one meditates on oneself

original: he ru ka dpal gzugs su bya //
analyzed: he ru ka dpal gzugs su bya //

original: sdo zhing drag po rnam sgyur pa //
analyzed: sdo zhing drag po rnam sgyur pa //

original: drag po spyang sum zhal drug mchog /
analyzed: drag po spyang sum zhal drug mchog /
translated: fierce, three-faced, six-armed supreme one,

original: zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'dzin //
analyzed: zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'dzin //
translated: holding a half-moon and matted hair,

original: sna tshogs rdo rje dbu mchog la //
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje dbu mchog la //
translated: with a supreme vajra cross on the head,

original: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dpu rgyan can //
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dpu rgyan can //

original: rdo rje phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: rdo rje phreng bas rnam par brgyan //

original: sku la mgo bo'i do shal can //
analyzed: sku la mgo bo'i do shal can //

original: phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan //
translated: Adorned with the six symbolic ornaments,

original: stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs //
analyzed: stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs //
translated: Wearing a tiger skin as a garment,

original: phag mo yis ni sku la brgyan //
analyzed: phag mo yis ni sku la brgyan //

analyzed: zhabs gcig pa ni bzhengs pa ste // g-yas pa ser la dud pa'i mdog /

analyzed: g-yon pa dmar la ljang gu 'o //

original: steng gi zhal ni rta gdong ste //
analyzed: steng gi zhal ni rta gdong ste //

original: dkar zhing sprin mdog drag cing 'dzigs //
analyzed: dkar zhing sprin mdog drag cing 'dzigs //

original: rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan //
translated: Holding a vajra and a bell,

original: lha mo mchu ni 'tshir ba ste //
analyzed: lha mo mchu ni 'tshir ba ste //

analyzed: rgyal ba'i pags pa gos su man bas //

analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi rigs 'dzin cing //

original: thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
analyzed: thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //

analyzed: rdo rje mtshan gyis brgyan pa ste // zhags pa @254b lcags kyu phyag na bsnams //
translated: Adorned with vajra marks,🔽Holding a noose and iron hook in his hands,

original: cang te'u dang ni mgo bo 'dzin //
analyzed: cang te'u dang ni mgo bo 'dzin //
translated: Holding a ḍamaru and head,

analyzed: gri gug zhags pa de bzhin te //

analyzed: phyag ni bcu gnyis dag tu bshad //

analyzed: dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kyang //

analyzed: zhabs gcig tu ni rnam par bsgom //

analyzed: glang po'i gdong dang byi 'u'i gdong //

analyzed: seng+ge'i gdong yang de bzhin te //

analyzed: dang po khyi yi gdong yin te //

analyzed: gnyis pa 'ug pa'i gdong yang yin; ;gsum pa phag gi gdong yin te //

analyzed: bzhi pa khra yi gdong can no //

analyzed: gnas kyi dbyibs kyi chos bdag nyid //

original: sna tshogs gzugs ri chen po 'dzin //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs ri chen po 'dzin //

original: mtha' yas rnam rgyal grags pa ste //
analyzed: mtha' yas rnam rgyal grags pa ste //

original: thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad pa //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad pa //

original: ji ltar 'dod pa'i sku lus 'chang //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod pa'i sku lus 'chang //

original: de bzhin bsgom zhing rnam bsgom ste //
analyzed: de bzhin bsgom zhing rnam bsgom ste //

analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs can rin chen bzhin; ;bdag nyid chen po rnam par rol //

analyzed: mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las //

analyzed: las sna tshogs sgrub pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o ////
translated: the chapter on accomplishing various activities is the thirty-fifth.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, I will explain the other🔽

original: phag mo'i mchog ni sgrub ba ste //🔽bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: phag mo'i mchog ni sgrub ba ste // bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis //

original: bdag nyid bsgom zhing rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: bdag nyid bsgom zhing rnam par bsgom //

original: sku ni nyi ma bcu gnyis gzi //
analyzed: sku ni nyi ma bcu gnyis gzi //

original: sku lus sindur 'dra mi g-yo //
analyzed: sku lus sindur 'dra mi g-yo //

original: me tog bantu ka lta bu //
analyzed: me tog bantu ka lta bu //

original: zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa //
analyzed: zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa //

analyzed: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs // sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis @255a *//

analyzed: bzhugs // thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can //

original: rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan //
translated: holding a vajra and a bell,

original: dbu skra mdzes pas 'khril ba ste //
analyzed: dbu skra mdzes pas 'khril ba ste //

original: thabs kyi zhal mchu rnam 'tshir zhing //
analyzed: thabs kyi zhal mchu rnam 'tshir zhing //

original: mda' dang gzhu ni 'dzin pa ste //
analyzed: mda' dang gzhu ni 'dzin pa ste //

original: rna ba'i mthar thug 'gengs par byed //
analyzed: rna ba'i mthar thug 'gengs par byed //

original: thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
analyzed: thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //

original: lcags kyu mchog gis 'gugs pa ste //
analyzed: lcags kyu mchog gis 'gugs pa ste //

analyzed: padma dmar po'i dbus bzhugs shing //

analyzed: 'dod pa thams cad rab tu stsol //

analyzed: yang na phyag ni bcu gnyis pa //

analyzed: zhal drug lha mo'i sku lus 'byung //
translated: With a body of a goddess with six faces.

original: steng gi zhal ni phag rgod gdong /
analyzed: steng gi zhal ni phag rgod gdong /

analyzed: drag po gzi brjid 'jigs pa'i gzi // shar gyi 'dab la rdo rje gsang ba'i mchog /
translated: Fierce, brilliant, and terrifying.🔽On the petal in the east is Vajraguhyāgra,

analyzed: g-yon pa'i phyogs su rdo rje dam tshig mchog / nub kyi phyogs su rdo rje gzi brjid mchog /
translated: To the left is Vajrasamāyagragā,🔽In the west is Vajratejāgra,

original: lho yi phyogs su rdo rje rin chen mchog /🔽me yi phyogs su rdo rje ye shes mchog /
analyzed: lho yi phyogs su rdo rje rin chen mchog / me yi phyogs su rdo rje ye shes mchog /
translated: In the south is Vajraratnāgra,🔽In the southeast is Vajrajñānāgra,

original: bden bral phyogs su rdo rje rig mchog ma //🔽rlung gi phyogs su rdo rje grub mchog ma //
analyzed: bden bral phyogs su rdo rje rig mchog ma // rlung gi phyogs su rdo rje grub mchog ma //
translated: In the southwest is Vajravidyāgradevī,🔽In the northwest is Vajrasiddhidevī,

analyzed: dbang ldan phyogs su rdo rje thal mchog ma // sgo la rdo rje 'bar mchog ma //

original: rdo rje gzi brjid mchog ma ste //
analyzed: rdo rje gzi brjid mchog ma ste //

analyzed: rdo rje khro bo mchog ma dang // rdo rje mche ba mchog ma 'o //

original: lha mo de dag thams cad kyang //
analyzed: lha mo de dag thams cad kyang //

original: dmar ba'i mdog can zhal gsum pa //
analyzed: dmar ba'i mdog can zhal gsum pa //

original: phyag drug pa la spyan gsum pa //
analyzed: phyag drug pa la spyan gsum pa //

original: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs //
analyzed: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs //

original: dbu skra dag ni grol ba ste /
analyzed: dbu skra dag ni grol ba ste /

original: @255b thams cad rgyan gyis rnam brgyan cing //
analyzed: @255b thams cad rgyan gyis rnam brgyan cing //

original: rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas //
translated: Holding a vajra and a bell,

original: rang gi lus kyis thabs la 'khril //
analyzed: rang gi lus kyis thabs la 'khril //

original: zhags pa dang ni lcags kyu dang // thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
analyzed: zhags pa dang ni lcags kyu dang // thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //

analyzed: grva bzhi dag tu mda' gzhu dag / yongs su 'gengs pa gnas par bzhag //

analyzed: sgo ru g-yas brkyang zhabs kyis bzhugs //

original: gcer bu rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal //
analyzed: gcer bu rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal //

original: thams cad yi dvags gdan la bzhugs //
analyzed: thams cad yi dvags gdan la bzhugs //
translated: Seated on a corpse seat,🔽Waving a vajra, making a threatening gesture,

analyzed: rdo rje gsor zhing sdigs mdzub dang // zhags pa dang ni yang dag ldan //

original: gzhan yang phan tshun dag tu yang //
analyzed: gzhan yang phan tshun dag tu yang //

original: ji ltar 'khor la sogs phyag 'tshal; ;de snyid ye shes lha mo ni //
analyzed: ji ltar 'khor la sogs phyag 'tshal; ;de snyid ye shes lha mo ni //

original: sku gsung thugs dang bcas pa bsgom //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs dang bcas pa bsgom //

original: ye shes dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: ye shes dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the union of the mandala of gnosis,

original: chos kyi ro ni mnyam par thim //
analyzed: chos kyi ro ni mnyam par thim //
translated: The taste of the Dharma is equally absorbed.🔽Having emanated the recitation of gnosis,

original: ye shes bzlas pa spros nas ni; ;cho ga'i rim pas yang dag bsdu //
analyzed: ye shes bzlas pa spros nas ni; ;cho ga'i rim pas yang dag bsdu //
translated: Gather it properly with the sequence of rites.

original: dam tshig mchog gi bzlas pa yis //
analyzed: dam tshig mchog gi bzlas pa yis //
translated: By the recitation of the supreme commitment,

original: zla ba'i de nyid 'grub par 'gyur //🔽aom shr'i badzra b'a r'a hi a'a bam hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: zla ba'i de nyid 'grub par 'gyur // aom shr'i badzra b'a r'a hi a'a bam hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: The reality of the moon will be accomplished.🔽Oṃ śrī vajra-vārāhī āṃ vaṃ huṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom shr'i badzra gu hya autta me hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom shri badzra sa ma ya autta me hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i badzra gu hya autta me hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom shri badzra sa ma ya autta me hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ śrī vajra-guhya uttamaṃ huṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ śrī vajra-samaya uttamaṃ huṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom shr'i badzra te dzotta me hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom shr'i badzra ratnotta me hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i badzra te dzotta me hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom shr'i badzra ratnotta me hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ śrī vajra-teja uttamaṃ huṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ śrī vajra-ratna uttamaṃ huṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom shr'i badzra dznya no tta me hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom shr'i badzra bidya autta me hum h'um phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i badzra dznya no tta me hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom shr'i badzra bidya autta me hum h'um phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ śrī vajra-jñāna uttamaṃ huṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ śrī vajra-vidyā uttamaṃ huṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom shr'i badzra siddhe tta me hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i badzra siddhe tta me hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ śrī vajra-siddhi uttamaṃ huṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom shr'i badzra bhasmatta me hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom shr'i badzra dz'a lotta me dze: hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i badzra bhasmatta me hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom shr'i badzra dz'a lotta me dze: hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ śrī vajra bhasma ta me huṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ śrī vajra jvalottamae jeḥ huṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom shr'i badzra aom mri totta me hum h'um phat @256a *//🔽sv'ah'a / aom shr'i badzra kro bhotta me bam hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i badzra aom mri totta me hum h'um phat @256a *// sv'ah'a / aom shr'i badzra kro bhotta me bam hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ śrī vajra amṛtottamae huṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ śrī vajra krobottamae vaṃ huṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom shr'i badzra damshtotta me ho:hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i badzra damshtotta me ho:hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ śrī vajra daṃṣṭrottamae hoḥ huṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis //
analyzed: 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis //
translated: By means of these, in the proper order,🔽one should perform meditation and recitation,

original: sgom pa dang ni bzlas pa bya; ;bsdu dang spro ba byas nas ni //
analyzed: sgom pa dang ni bzlas pa bya; ;bsdu dang spro ba byas nas ni //
translated: and having performed the gathering and the radiating,

original: chos rnams kun dang chos tsan ni //
analyzed: chos rnams kun dang chos tsan ni //
translated: all phenomena and the Dharma itself

original: rang gi lha yi sbyor bas dag /
analyzed: rang gi lha yi sbyor bas dag /
translated: are purified by the yoga of one’s deity.

original: sems can thams cad rab tu brtag /
analyzed: sems can thams cad rab tu brtag /
translated: One should visualize all sentient beings🔽as the abode of yoga, the Dharma,

original: rnal 'byor gnas ni chos yin te; ;gsang ba gsum la rab tu gzhug /
analyzed: rnal 'byor gnas ni chos yin te; ;gsang ba gsum la rab tu gzhug /

original: gsang gsum gnas ni chos yin te //
analyzed: gsang gsum gnas ni chos yin te //
translated: The abode of the three secrets is the Dharma,

original: chos kyang de bzhin de lta bu //
analyzed: chos kyang de bzhin de lta bu //
translated: and the Dharma is just like that.

original: bdag med chos ni chos yin te //
analyzed: bdag med chos ni chos yin te //
translated: The Dharma is the selfless Dharma,

original: chos las chos ni yod ma yin //
analyzed: chos las chos ni yod ma yin //
translated: and the Dharma does not exist in the Dharma.

original: mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
analyzed: mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
translated: Chapter Thirty-Six,

original: gsang ba gsum gyi dam tshig gi mchog ces bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o ////
analyzed: gsang ba gsum gyi dam tshig gi mchog ces bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o ////

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, what is to be explained next

analyzed: rdo rje sems sku dkar po ste //

analyzed: rdo rje nyim dmar po ste //

analyzed: yang na so sor bsgom par bya; ;rdo rje sems dpa' zhal gsum pa //

analyzed: phyag drug spyan ni gsum pa ste //

analyzed: phyag rgya drug gi mtshan gyis brgyan //

analyzed: rdo rje dril bu thod kha tv'am// ral gri cang ti'u mgo bo 'chang //

original: na ra'i pags mnabs gar dang bcas //
analyzed: na ra'i pags mnabs gar dang bcas //

original: rnam snang la sogs dpa' bo kun //
analyzed: rnam snang la sogs dpa' bo kun //

analyzed: zhal gdong drug par bsgom par bya //

analyzed: de dag gsang sngags 'di yin te // aom shri aom bam bam hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /

analyzed: aom shri h'am yom yam hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /

analyzed: aom shr'i h'i mom mam hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom shr'i hrem hrim sam hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /

original: aom shr'i h'um h'um sam hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom shr'i phat phat tsam h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom shr'i h'um h'um sam hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom shr'i phat phat tsam h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /

original: de dag ni /
analyzed: de dag ni /
translated: These are

analyzed: rnal 'byor ma drug gi gsang sngags so // aom ha:bam h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: the secret mantras of the six yoginis.🔽Om ha vam hum phat svāhā.

analyzed: aom na ma hi bhrum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom sv'ah'a hu hri hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /

original: aom boo lat he him h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom boo lat he him h'um phat sv'ah'a /

original: aom h'um h'um ho tr'am hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom h'um h'um ho tr'am hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /

original: aom phat ham h'im hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom phat ham h'im hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Om phat ham him hum hum phat svāhā.

analyzed: 'di ni dpa' bo drug gi sngags //

analyzed: bzlas pa dang ni bsgoms tsam gyis //

analyzed: 'khor los bsgyur ba thob pa ste //

analyzed: 'khor los bsgyur drug rgyal por 'gyur //

original: mi snang la sogs grub nas ni //

original: 'gro ba drug gi sems can grol //
analyzed: 'gro ba drug gi sems can grol //

analyzed: gnas kyi 'khor lo bsgoms nas ni //

analyzed: khva gdong la sogs mkha' 'gro ma //

analyzed: zur du gshin rje sreg la sogs //

analyzed: g-yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis gnas //

original: drag po skra ni grol ba ste //
analyzed: drag po skra ni grol ba ste //

analyzed: thams cad thod pa'i phreng ba can // rang gi phyi dang nang du yang // pha rol phyin drug rnam par dag /
translated: and all of them have garlands of skulls.🔽One should meditate and meditate again

original: bsgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya //
analyzed: bsgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya //
translated: on the six perfections, both external and internal,

original: spro zhing bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: spro zhing bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: purified by the yoga of emanating and gathering

original: gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzlas pa bya //
analyzed: gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzlas pa bya //
translated: in the secret cakra recitation.

original: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma bzlas na //
analyzed: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma bzlas na //
translated: If one recites the heroes and yoginīs,

original: bsgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya //
analyzed: bsgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya //
translated: one should meditate and meditate again.

original: sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i tshogs spros nas //
analyzed: sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i tshogs spros nas //
translated: Having emanated the assembly of the emanation cakra,

original: 'gro ba gsum po rdzogs par byas //
analyzed: 'gro ba gsum po rdzogs par byas //
translated: one should perfect the three realms.

original: nang gi bdag nyid bsgoms pa yis //
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid bsgoms pa yis //
translated: Having meditated on the inner nature,

original: 'khor lo gsum gsang bsgoms nas bzlas //
analyzed: 'khor lo gsum gsang bsgoms nas bzlas //
translated: one should recite the meditation of the secret three cakras.

original: de nyid gsum dang sngags lhan cig /
analyzed: de nyid gsum dang sngags lhan cig /
translated: The three realities and the mantra

original: dpa' bo dang ni mkha' 'gro ma //
analyzed: dpa' bo dang ni mkha' 'gro ma //
translated: are the heroes and ḍākinīs.

original: hu h'um phat ni mtha' ru ste //
analyzed: hu h'um phat ni mtha' ru ste //
translated: Hūṃ phaṭ at the end.🔽One should recite the three wheels.

original: 'khor lo gsum gyi bzlas pa bya //
analyzed: 'khor lo gsum gyi bzlas pa bya //
translated: The one who has the commitments should recite them

original: rnal 'byor cho ga bzhin du ni //🔽dam tshig can gyis de bzlas bya; ;aom shr'i manydzu badzra aa:h'um mam hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom ha badzra satva hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: rnal 'byor cho ga bzhin du ni // dam tshig can gyis de bzlas bya; ;aom shr'i manydzu badzra aa:h'um mam hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom ha badzra satva hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: according to the procedure of yoga.🔽Oṃ śrīmañjuvajra aḥ hūṃ maṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ ha vajrasattva hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ vaṃ vajravārāhī hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom bam badzra b'a r'a hi hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom na ma:hi badzra bee ro tsa na hu'm h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom bam badzra b'a r'a hi hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom na ma:hi badzra bee ro tsa na hu'm h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ namahī vajra vairocana hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom ham yom ya @259a *//🔽ma ni hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom sv'ah'a h'um padma na rte shva ra hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom hr'im mom mo ha ni hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom bo sha tva he he ru kam hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom hr'em hrim sanytsa la ni hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom ham yom ya @259a *// ma ni hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom sv'ah'a h'um padma na rte shva ra hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom hr'im mom mo ha ni hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom bo sha tva he he ru kam hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom hr'em hrim sanytsa la ni hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ haṃ yoṃ yamāntakrī hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

analyzed: aom h'um h'um ho badzra surya hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /

original: aom h'um h'um sam tr'a sa ni hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom h'um h'um sam tr'a sa ni hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ hūṃ hūṃ saṃtara saṃni hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom phat ham pa ra m'a shva hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom phat phat tsandi ka hum h'um phat sv'ah'a /🔽aom k'a k'a sye h'um h'um phat/
analyzed: aom phat ham pa ra m'a shva hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom phat phat tsandi ka hum h'um phat sv'ah'a / aom k'a k'a sye h'um h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ phaṭ haṃ pāra māśvā hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ phaṭ phaṭ caṇḍikā hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽Oṃ kā kāsyai hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom au l'u k'a sye hum h'um phat/🔽aom shv'a n'a sye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom au l'u k'a sye hum h'um phat/ aom shv'a n'a sye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ ūrū kāsyai hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ śvā nāsyai hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom s'u ka r'a sye hum h'um phat/🔽aom ya ma d'a dhi ye hum h'um phat/🔽aom ya ma du t'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom s'u ka r'a sye hum h'um phat/ aom ya ma d'a dhi ye hum h'um phat/ aom ya ma du t'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ sū kara syai hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ yama dādhiye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ yama dūtīye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom ya ma damshti n'i ye hum h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ya ma damshti n'i ye hum h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ yama daṃṣṭrīṇye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom ya ma ma tha n'i ye hum h'um phat/🔽g-yon dang g-yas kyi lag gnyis su //
analyzed: aom ya ma ma tha n'i ye hum h'um phat/ g-yon dang g-yas kyi lag gnyis su //
translated: Oṃ yama mathaniṇye hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽In the two hands, left and right,

original: go cha gnyis po bkod nas ni //
analyzed: go cha gnyis po bkod nas ni //
translated: one should arrange the two armors.

original: gang zhig ji ltar 'dod pa ru //
analyzed: gang zhig ji ltar 'dod pa ru //
translated: Whatever one wishes,

original: las rnams thams cad byed pa yin //
analyzed: las rnams thams cad byed pa yin //
translated: one should perform all the activities.

original: the tshom med par las byas na //
analyzed: the tshom med par las byas na //
translated: Having performed the activities without doubt,

original: nges par dngos grub gzhan du min //
analyzed: nges par dngos grub gzhan du min //
translated: one will certainly attain power, not otherwise.

original: yang na mgon pos bcu'i dbang //
analyzed: yang na mgon pos bcu'i dbang //
translated: Or, the lord is established in the ten perfections,

original: pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas //
analyzed: pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas //
translated: abiding in the ten perfections.

original: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus //
analyzed: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus //
translated: Generosity, morality, patience, diligence,

original: bsam gtan shes rab drug pa ste //
analyzed: bsam gtan shes rab drug pa ste //
translated: Concentration, and wisdom are the six.

original: thabs dang stobs dang smon lam //
analyzed: thabs dang stobs dang smon lam //
translated: Means, strength, aspiration,

original: dang // ye shes sgo skyong rnam dag pa'o //
analyzed: dang // ye shes sgo skyong rnam dag pa'o //
translated: And knowledge are the four gates.🔽The pure ones are the four:

original: rab tu dga' dang dri ma med //
analyzed: rab tu dga' dang dri ma med //
translated: Very joyful, stainless,

original: 'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro can //
analyzed: 'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro can //
translated: Shining, and blazing.

original: sbyang dka' ba dang mngon du gyur //
analyzed: sbyang dka' ba dang mngon du gyur //
translated: Hard to conquer, manifest,🔽Gone far, immovable,

original: ring du song dang mi g-yo @259b ba; ;legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin //
analyzed: ring du song dang mi g-yo @259b ba; ;legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin //
translated: Excellent wisdom, and cloud of Dharma.

original: 'di yis rnam par dag pa bsgom //
analyzed: 'di yis rnam par dag pa bsgom //
translated: These are the ten grounds.

original: gshin rje sreg sogs bzhi po ni //
analyzed: gshin rje sreg sogs bzhi po ni //
translated: Yama, Agni, and so on, the four,

original: 'phags pa'i bden par rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden par rnam par bsgom //
translated: Are meditated on as the four noble truths.🔽Suffering, origin,

original: sdug bsngal dang ni kun 'byung dang // 'gog pa dang ni lam rnams te //
analyzed: sdug bsngal dang ni kun 'byung dang // 'gog pa dang ni lam rnams te //
translated: Cessation, and path.

original: bcom ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje dpal //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje dpal //
translated: The Bhagavān is glorious Mañjuvajra,

original: chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam dag ste //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam dag ste //
translated: Pure as the dharmadhātu,

original: ye shes rang gi ngo bo yin //
analyzed: ye shes rang gi ngo bo yin //
translated: The essence of wisdom.

original: 'di ltar rnam par dag pa bsgom //
analyzed: 'di ltar rnam par dag pa bsgom //
translated: Thus, meditate on purity.

original: gnyis su med par sbyor ba'i lam //
analyzed: gnyis su med par sbyor ba'i lam //
translated: The path of union of nonduality,

original: gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba ste //
analyzed: gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba ste //
translated: Secret and supremely secret,

original: rnal 'byor stobs kyis gsang ba mchog /
analyzed: rnal 'byor stobs kyis gsang ba mchog /
translated: The supreme secret by the power of yoga,🔽the teaching by means of practice,🔽and the divisions of the master just as they are,

original: sgrub pas rjes su bstan pa dang // ji bzhin bdag po'i dbye ba dang // bla ma'i rim pa legs par bslangs //
analyzed: sgrub pas rjes su bstan pa dang // ji bzhin bdag po'i dbye ba dang // bla ma'i rim pa legs par bslangs //
translated: are well-explained in the stages of the guru.

original: 'di ltar cho ga gnyis med pa //
analyzed: 'di ltar cho ga gnyis med pa //
translated: Thus, the nondual rite

original: sbyor ba'i dam tshig mchog yin te //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i dam tshig mchog yin te //
translated: is the supreme pledge of union.

original: dngos grub kun gyi thabs kyi rgyu //
analyzed: dngos grub kun gyi thabs kyi rgyu //
translated: It is the cause of the means of all powers,

original: rnal 'byor ma thugs gsang ba che //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma thugs gsang ba che //
translated: the mind of the yoginīs, the great secret.

original: las rnams kun gyi 'bras bu ster //🔽mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
analyzed: las rnams kun gyi 'bras bu ster // mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
translated: It bestows the fruit of all actions.

original: gnyis su med pa'i go cha'i sbyor ba bskyed pa'i sgom pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o ////
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i go cha'i sbyor ba bskyed pa'i sgom pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o ////
translated: This concludes the chapter on the meditation of the generation of the armor of nonduality, the thirty-seventh chapter of the Tantra of the Supreme Original Buddha.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, next I will explain

original: brda ni mchog tu gsang ba ste //
analyzed: brda ni mchog tu gsang ba ste //
translated: the supreme secret of the signs.

original: brda ni yongs su mi shes par //
analyzed: brda ni yongs su mi shes par //
translated: Without fully understanding the signs,

original: sbyor ba'i dngos grub mi 'grub ste //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i dngos grub mi 'grub ste //
translated: the power of union will not be accomplished.

original: 'di ni nges par shes pa na //
analyzed: 'di ni nges par shes pa na //
translated: If this is definitely understood,

original: dngos grub 'grub par the tshom med //
analyzed: dngos grub 'grub par the tshom med //
translated: there is no doubt that power will be accomplished.

original: dra zhes bya ba skyes bur bshad //
analyzed: dra zhes bya ba skyes bur bshad //
translated: The syllable “dra” is explained as the person.

original: di zhes bya ba @260a *//
analyzed: di zhes bya ba @260a *//
translated: The syllable di

original: bud med yin //
analyzed: bud med yin //
translated: is a woman.

original: bu zhes bya ba gnon pa yin //
analyzed: bu zhes bya ba gnon pa yin //
translated: The syllable bu is a conqueror.

original: su zhes bya bzang nyid //🔽ma zhes bya ba ma ru bshad //
analyzed: su zhes bya bzang nyid // ma zhes bya ba ma ru bshad //
translated: The syllable su is excellent.🔽The syllable ma is explained as a mother.

original: ya zhes bya ba chung ma nyid //
analyzed: ya zhes bya ba chung ma nyid //
translated: The syllable ya is a wife.

original: bha zhes bya ba sring mo can //
analyzed: bha zhes bya ba sring mo can //
translated: The syllable bha is a sister.

original: bhi zhes bya ba mdza' mor bshad //
analyzed: bhi zhes bya ba mdza' mor bshad //
translated: The syllable bhi is explained as a friend.

original: lu zhes bya ba bu mo yin //
analyzed: lu zhes bya ba bu mo yin //
translated: The syllable lu is a daughter.

original: sri zhes bya ba khrag tu bshad //
analyzed: sri zhes bya ba khrag tu bshad //
translated: The syllable sri is explained as blood.

original: so ni zhi ba'i btung ba yin //
analyzed: so ni zhi ba'i btung ba yin //
translated: The syllable so is a drink of peace.

original: pe zhes bya ba thug pa ste //🔽di zhes bya ba de bzhin sha /
analyzed: pe zhes bya ba thug pa ste // di zhes bya ba de bzhin sha /
translated: The syllable pe is a soup.🔽The syllable di is meat.

original: ba zhes bya ba za ba yin //
analyzed: ba zhes bya ba za ba yin //
translated: The syllable va is to eat.

original: bhu zhes bya ba 'dres pa yin //🔽pi zhes bya ba dur khrod yin //
analyzed: bhu zhes bya ba 'dres pa yin // pi zhes bya ba dur khrod yin //
translated: The syllable bhu is a mixture.🔽The syllable pi is a charnel ground.

original: du zhes bya ba ro yin no //
analyzed: du zhes bya ba ro yin no //
translated: The syllable du is a corpse.

original: t'i zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: t'i zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma //
translated: The syllable ti is a yoginī.

original: g'a zhes bya ba l'a ma yin //
analyzed: g'a zhes bya ba l'a ma yin //
translated: The syllable gā is a lāmā.

original: tri zhes bya ba gzugs can ma //
analyzed: tri zhes bya ba gzugs can ma //
translated: The syllable tri is a vaṅgī.

original: ku zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro ma //
analyzed: ku zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro ma //
translated: The syllable ku is a dakini.

original: ha ni khanda ro nyid ma //
analyzed: ha ni khanda ro nyid ma //
translated: The syllable ha is a khaṇḍarohā.

original: dza zhes bya ba byin pa gnyis //
analyzed: dza zhes bya ba byin pa gnyis //
translated: The syllable ja is the two thighs.

original: ba zhes bya ba gsong bor smra //
analyzed: ba zhes bya ba gsong bor smra //
translated: The syllable va is to speak pleasantly.

original: sva zhes bya ba legs 'ongs yin //
analyzed: sva zhes bya ba legs 'ongs yin //
translated: Sva is “welcome,”

original: mi zhes bya ba nya yin la //
analyzed: mi zhes bya ba nya yin la //
translated: and mi is “fish.”

original: byo zhes bya ba bza' ba yin //
analyzed: byo zhes bya ba bza' ba yin //
translated: Bho is “food,”

original: phyo zhes bya ba btung ba yin //
analyzed: phyo zhes bya ba btung ba yin //
translated: and phow is “drink.”

original: ga ni bgrod dang bgrod min yin //
analyzed: ga ni bgrod dang bgrod min yin //
translated: Ga is “to go” and “not to go,”

original: ka zhes bya ba 'dod pa yin //
analyzed: ka zhes bya ba 'dod pa yin //
translated: and ka is “desire.”

original: sa zhes bya ba gzhan mi 'gro //
analyzed: sa zhes bya ba gzhan mi 'gro //
translated: Sa is “not to go elsewhere,”

original: ra zhes bya ba khyo mid mo //
analyzed: ra zhes bya ba khyo mid mo //
translated: and ra is “husband” and “wife.”

original: du zhes bya ba spyod ngan mo //
analyzed: du zhes bya ba spyod ngan mo //
translated: Du is “bad conduct,”

original: su zhes bya ba skal bzang mo //
analyzed: su zhes bya ba skal bzang mo //
translated: and su is “good fortune.”

original: na zhes bya ba skal ngan //🔽sa zhes bya ba dam tshig can //
analyzed: na zhes bya ba skal ngan // sa zhes bya ba dam tshig can //
translated: Na is “misfortune,”🔽and sa is “one who has a vow.”

original: aa zhes bya ba dam tshig med //
analyzed: aa zhes bya ba dam tshig med //
translated: A is “one who has no vow,”

original: ai zhes bya ba 'ongs pa yin //
analyzed: ai zhes bya ba 'ongs pa yin //
translated: and i is “come.”

original: na zhes @260b bya ba ma 'ongs yin //
analyzed: na zhes @260b bya ba ma 'ongs yin //
translated: Na is “do not come,”

original: so zhes bya ba chags pa yin //
analyzed: so zhes bya ba chags pa yin //
translated: and so is “attachment.”

original: 'di dag yi ge'i brda yin te //🔽dbang bskur dus su rnal 'byor pas //
analyzed: 'di dag yi ge'i brda yin te // dbang bskur dus su rnal 'byor pas //
translated: These are the symbolic syllables.🔽The yogi/nī should give food and non-food

original: bza' dang bza' med sbyin par bya //
analyzed: bza' dang bza' med sbyin par bya //
translated: at the time of the empowerment.

original: dbang bskur ba ni mchog yin te //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba ni mchog yin te //
translated: The empowerment is supreme,

original: dam tshig mchog ni shes pa dang // dam tshig can gyi dam tshig dus //
analyzed: dam tshig mchog ni shes pa dang // dam tshig can gyi dam tshig dus //
translated: and the supreme vow is known.

original: dam tshig 'khor lo 'dus pa dang // dad pa rnams la sbyin par bya //
analyzed: dam tshig 'khor lo 'dus pa dang // dad pa rnams la sbyin par bya //
translated: Should be given to those who have faith,

original: ma dad pa la sbyin mi bya //🔽mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
analyzed: ma dad pa la sbyin mi bya // mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las /
translated: but not to those who lack faith.🔽This concludes the chapter on the symbolic meanings, the thirty-eighth

original: brda'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o ////
analyzed: brda'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o ////
translated: in the glorious tantra of “The All-Creating Sovereign, the Great Space.”

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, I will explain

original: rnal 'byor ma yi mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi mtshan nyid ni //
translated: the characteristics of the yoginīs,

original: gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni //
translated: by merely knowing which

original: sgrub pa po yis dngos grub thob //
analyzed: sgrub pa po yis dngos grub thob //
translated: the adept will attain spiritual powers.

original: bud med pad rtsa ltar dkar zhing //
analyzed: bud med pad rtsa ltar dkar zhing //
translated: A woman who is as white as the root of a lotus,

original: padma'i 'dab ltar dkyus ring mig /
analyzed: padma'i 'dab ltar dkyus ring mig /
translated: with eyes long like lotus petals,

original: rtag tu gos ni dkar la dga'//
analyzed: rtag tu gos ni dkar la dga'//
translated: who always delights in white garments,

original: tsandan gsar pa'i dri dang ldan //
analyzed: tsandan gsar pa'i dri dang ldan //
translated: and has the scent of fresh sandalwood,

original: de gshegs 'dus pa nyid la dga'//
analyzed: de gshegs 'dus pa nyid la dga'//
translated: who delights in the very assembly of those who have gone,

original: de rigs las byung shes par bya //
analyzed: de rigs las byung shes par bya //
translated: should be known as one who has arisen from that family.

original: bud gang btso ma'i gser 'dra zhing //
analyzed: bud gang btso ma'i gser 'dra zhing //
translated: A woman who is like refined gold,

original: dmar dang ser ba'i gos la dga'//
analyzed: dmar dang ser ba'i gos la dga'//

translated: of the glorious Heruka.

original: sprin gyi mdog 'dra'i bud med gang //
analyzed: sprin gyi mdog 'dra'i bud med gang //
translated: The woman who is the color of a cloud,

original: so ni mi mnyam par gnas shing //
analyzed: so ni mi mnyam par gnas shing //
translated: with uneven teeth,

original: rtag tu gdug pa'i las la dga'//
analyzed: rtag tu gdug pa'i las la dga'//
